body: Worst app ever, it took 4 tries to make an account, kept saying my email was invalid which is isn‚Äôt, then kept offering me different subscriptions, which I didn‚Äôt want to commit to without trying out the app first. However, could not upload a single thing without the ad popping up, every time I would click the camera button it would show me all the subscriptions then close out the app completely. Waste. Of. Time.

title: Meh....
body: Used it for a week or so ... I would suggest them instead of having this long list of useless diet ( Scandinavian , 6:1 are you serious ?! Nobody need those) they could add diabetes control diet, high cholesterol control diet , PCOS compliance diet . I mean something that can be really helpful and actually change people‚Äôs life!

title: Still new to app
body: So far I‚Äôm still learning app, but I‚Äôm having difficulty finding a simple way to input food into the daily diary if I use a recipe from another source (ie..Pinterest) I have to type in each ingredient. Would be great if there was an import option for recipes. There very well may be, but Day 5 & haven‚Äôt found it so I‚Äôm getting lax on doing the diaryüò≥

title: Verified info is wrong and won't let you change it
body: I want to add the item correctly, but it says the barcode already exists and won't let me. It asks me to view the item and when I do the item is the wrong item. I want to be able to attach the barcode to the correct item I added.

title: Not What I Expected
body: The program is pretty but when looking at the Keto diet plan it shows recipes what are not actually keto friendly. I don‚Äôt want to eat 25g of carbs in one sitting. It also pushes fruit consumption. Anyone who has researched Keto knows fruit isn‚Äôt something you should be eating. Sadly you have to pay the premium subscription before you can test the app. Now I‚Äôm out $50 on an app I will never use. Should have a free trial! Has so much potential, just not there yet. I‚Äôd love a refund!

title: GREAT but...
body: Best calorie tracking app I‚Äôve used. I honestly LOVE it but a huge downside is the auto tracker (for my Apple watch) turns off every couple days and you have to delete the app and reinstall for it to work again. Extremely frustrating, but only downside of an awesome easy to use application.

title: Great app
body: Was really under weight and was constantly worried on how I looked (15 year old boy) After getting this app it Helped me stick to my goal went from 75 pounds to 125 in a little over a year great app helped me bunch would highly recommend it

title: Decent. Just not for me
body: I like simple. There's SOO much going on in this app that it makes it unintuitive. Also, I had chicken breast and scrambled eggs for breakfast, how is it that there's like 3 options for scrambled eggs? 1.8oz, 1.9oz, etc. Then you have to make sure you add the right one the next morning or it'll throw off the consistency of tracking calories/what you eat anyway. Like I said, it's pretty, just not what I was looking for. So 2 stars for pretty.

title: Didn‚Äôt even start
body: I used to use this app a while ago and just recently re-downloaded it after I put in my email to make a new account and put done it shows me that it‚Äôs loading but never does. I tried deleting the app and re-downloading it I‚Äôve tried changes WiFi setting, going to a different location to see if it loads and it won‚Äôt load. Everything else on my phone is running just fine so it has to be the app.

title: Wish I could get my money back
body: Entering in food is not as easy or accurate as MyFitnessPal. They do not have a big enough database. I do like that I can scan items but I wish I could create my own meals and save them.

title: Just started using this app
body: First let me say it is a gorgeous layout and very visually appealing. For me, it makes me WANT to log my food and normally I get bored with journal entries. I did sign up for the premium but the price was fair. I‚Äôm looking forward to using this. Nice job to the developers!

title: Fix the bugs!
body: It was working just fine but it started to change my settings on its own! I selected that I want to lose weight and it continues to change to gain weight. If this bug is not fixed I would like my money back. I paid for the full year so at least refund me the other 11 months worth cause it‚Äôs pointless for me to have paid for an app that is not doing its job.

title: Post partum
body: This is so helpful when I was postpartum for eating more healthy  meals. But what I really loved is as a busy mom I forget to eat and this would remind me now I just need to have the practice of food prepping it all before the week starts! ü•∞thank you so much!

title: Good content at upgrade levels.
body: Seems like a great app. Have to pay for the most useful content. Free version doesn‚Äôt provide much support. A great added feature is the ability to choose a status specific for nursing mothers as they burn and should consume added calories.

title: Love love love it
body: I‚Äôve never wanted to pay for an app before but I am def upgrading for this one! Easy to use. Gives me tips, sync with my watch and tracks my exercise. Totally recommend to anyone wanting to track calories, carbs, fat. Helps tailor a diet plan for me! Love it

title: Calorie intake
body: I just got the app and I am struggling as to why my calorie intake changes daily. I am starting around 1600 because I am cutting and then after lunch today I check my nutrition and I am suppose to eat over 2k.

title: Took away all features.
body: I have been using this app for 2 years now, and I log in to track for the day and not I have to pay a subscription for the features I‚Äôve been using for 2 years already! Kind of annoying that I need to find a new app now. Great app I loved using it, not worth paying monthly for it though.

title: Amazing but....
body: I love Lifesum! I found it from Chloe Ting! It tracks my calorie intake and tells me what I should be eating! I also love how it gives a reaction to the meal you eat. But... I don‚Äôt like how you have to pay to eat access to the meals. I do understand they need to make money! Over all I recommend even if u don‚Äôt get premium!

title: Beautiful and Buggy
body: The app is beautiful and well designed but the performance is subpar. I often have problems adding food to meals, there‚Äôs no easy way to just input macros from a recipe you make outside the app and when I do try to create a recipe on the app, it will crash or cancel making me have to redo all my work. Getting frustrated and only staying to use because I already payed for a subscription.

title: Visually appealing but lots of bugs
body: This app is great for tracking macros and food intake and has a lot of healthy recipes as well as plans to help kick start your health journey. However, there are a few bugs that don‚Äôt make it a perfect 5 star:

title: Awesome but could use some work!
body: The App is really great to keep track of everything which is supper nice! However, when it comes to the food and meal plans it would be nice to be able to add food allergies, or add a list for good substitutes for certain foods because I am not able to eat certain ingredients that I‚Äôm supposed to be eating in the meal plans!

title: Great app
body: I have been using this app for about a year and a half.  Easiest app I have found for tracking macros, especially Keto macros. Well worth the premium. I just recently switched to an iPhone and I love it even more. I recommend it to everyone!

title: Average tracker
body: The app is an average tracker. Has plenty of food options to choose from, has good reminders etc.  For what you pay the only way this app will spring into a superior tracker that is above the rest it will need to have a way to add personal recipes and nutrients, without that it‚Äôs a guessing game with what you choose and if your macros etc are correct.

title: Love
body: I love the app over all, it's user friendly and I love the smiley faces to tell me how I am doing. However, I HATE that it doesn't count net carbs especially because that is so important for a keto diet, since this app has the setting for a keto diet I would think it should be able

title: Crashes a lot
body: I like how nice the design is, very easy on the eyes. However it is not very intuitive to use and a little clunky to delete food after you‚Äôve input it but decided to eat something else. It also crashes all the time, even though I keep it updated. It closes randomly all the time and one time made my phone shut off because it crashed so hard.

title: New Feature Idea
body: Great app! helps me to be aware of what i‚Äôm putting in my body and to drink more water!! i have a suggestion for a new feature: a reminder to take any pills you need. for example a little button like the water that you press when you take your pills to help remind you!!

title: Beautiful app, but please add customization for the number of meals!
body: Love this interactive, beautiful app.  I do wish I could customize the number of meals I eat per day.  There is only the option of breakfast, lunch, dinner and snack, but I eat 5-6 small meals per day.  And when I add my 4th meal into snack I get a sad face for going over my calorie target... :(

title: Helpful Tool
body: I wanted a visual representation of my weight loss journey and Lifesum works very well for this job. I‚Äôm able to achieve my goals with this handy app. Very simple to use and customize. I would recommend this to others who want a food/habit tracker.

title: So much wasted potential
body: This app is pretty good, but could be so much better. Logging meals is inferior to MyFitnessPal by a wide margin, and it‚Äôs one redeeming quality is syncing other fitness apps to track calorie burn and update daily calorie goals automatically. However, this feature is extremely inconsistent and unreliable. If it became stable it would get five stars from me.

title: Lifesum is my health consultant
body: I strongly recommend everyone to upgrade to premium who are currently using this app as you will unlock a world realization and awareness. Those who are not using this app, you are really missing something. Kudos to Lifesum for coming up with such a great app.

title: Nutrition info is off on a lot of items
body: I love this app but I really want the options to have reliable nutrition info. Maybe it would help to add an option to punch in your own nutrition info if you are looking at a box or your out to eat where the nutrition info is displayed? I was going to pay for premium but then I noticed how off the numbers are.

title: Just a little suggestion
body: The app is great but the only thing I found slightly difficult was the water tracking, I wish they could add an option to where you can adjust the oz to your desired amount rather than the one they set for you

title: Needs the ability to make your own recipes
body: The apps is simple and clean. I like the better than MyFitnessPal which has gotten way to expensive. But what I do miss and was hoping this app would have is the ability to create your own recipes. It would make it more flexible for diets the app doesn‚Äôt necessary seem to include.

title: Lifesum
body: It is a wonderful app that lets you get heathy in the pace that you want and it tells you how much fat and protein it has and it has help me and other people it is the best diet plan app that you will find. if your looking for a diet plan app all ways use Lifesum.

title: There are some bugs
body: One particularly annoying bug: the weight on my goal will revert to the starting weight every few days and lose the weight that I had input the day previously. I then have to go into ‚ÄúMe‚Äù->‚Äùtrack measurements‚Äù and then update it manually.

title: Great app
body: I would like to say i love this app but i also have a few suggestions. I would like to see a more in depth custom meal option. And also an intermediate fasting plan involving 16 hours of fasting and 10 hours eating window please and thank you

title: Love this app
body: I love the life sum app because it gives you a grade on what you eat and helps to better pick quality calories. The only thing it‚Äôs missing is it doesn‚Äôt have an option to add if your pregnant or breastfeeding. I wish it would help to add in those breastfeeding calories.

title: Hasn‚Äôt improved much
body: I got this app a year ago. The food database is awesome, but they haven‚Äôt given any love to the workout section. Also, I don‚Äôt see a way to group items into a favorite meal. For example, I may have a protein shake with many different ingredients like oats, fruit and veggies. Doesn‚Äôt seem to let me group them together and give the group a name.

title: Great App Needs a Few Tweaks
body: This app is great but the ability to make edits that show up immediately would be helpful. Also the ability to make meals and foods right from the diary/food entry screen would make it pretty close to perfect. All in all I love the dark color scheme and the information the app gives in one place. Keep up the good work.

title: Can‚Äôt  edit nutrition
body: This app seems like it could be great except when you add a new food there doesn‚Äôt seem to be a way to add in any nutritional information except calories. I was wondering if this a premium feature except looking online it seems this has been a issue for years. I may go premium any ways to test the meal plans but as is I‚Äôm probably going to delete it soon

title: Love this app! So motivating!
body: This app gives real time feedback with everything you eat. It‚Äôs motivating me to improve my diet with slight adjustments that I hope will make a real lasting impact on my weight loss journey.  I would highly recommend trying this app!

title: Don't buy this
body: Most ridiculous non-intuitive app ever. Needlessly complicated, inconsistent, lack of any help or useful instructions to help you get started. Good luck trying to create s shopping list. I finally managed to sort of figure it but when I went the grocery store the next day and tried to open it, it did I had no list. Waste of money.  I regret buying a subscription because I've struggled enough and am tired of the constant frustration. I'm trashing it.

title: Love this app... need a pregnancy option
body: I love to use it to track the amount of carbs and protein and fat I‚Äôm getting. Wish there was an option to put that you‚Äôre pregnant so it can adjust accordingly. Otherwise, this app is great for people who aren‚Äôt pregnant and looking to be/stay healthy or lose weight.

title: Okay but can‚Äôt edit or add food
body: Overall, I like that I can set the app to my goals. However, a lot of foods on it are incredibly wrong. Comparing a label to what the app says shows a huge indiscretion, so I doubt a lot of the numbers I get. I also can‚Äôt seem to find a way to edit or add new foods. It‚Äôs a bit unfortunate since this is one of the few apps focused on the Keto diet.

title: Love it
body: I just bought this app and am on day 2 of using it.

title: It‚Äôs okay!
body: I like almost everything about this app but there is one thing you can improve on. It won‚Äôt allow me to add my foods from Pinterest with all their nutritional values. I can add calories or take a picture, but nothing else. I can‚Äôt get an accurate reading because of it.

title: Ok but not super user friendly
body: App is ok but not super user friendly. It doesn‚Äôt seem to create a base of items entered in the past unless you mark as favorites. Additionally I paid for the premium subscription because of the meal plans but there is no plan except for weight loss. Not all of us need to lose weight! The opposite is also not that easy.

title: So helpful!
body: I love this App!!! It has so many diet options, it‚Äôs perfect for anyone. Very intuitive and easy to use. I‚Äôve even used it to scan foods in the grocery store...I get immediate feedback on whether it‚Äôs a good choice for the diet I‚Äôm following (with a happy or sad face).

title: Fix the sync with Health
body: The app with randomly not add the steps tracked by Health into the exercise tab for the day. This is annoying. I thought it had been fixed with the last update because it hadn‚Äôt happened for a while but nope.

title: Awesome
body: Was really iffy for this app but i actual was able to keep track of everything and inclusively you get so many great tips to reach whatever goal you‚Äôre out to look for, well done thank you developers üôåüèª

title: Some needed Improvements
body: I love this app and the layout but there are some features I wish they would implement. Some little features like when

title: TRASH TRASH TRASH !!!
body: I‚Äôve been using this app for two years now. They started charging you for most of the features. However, I still use it as a free user. This whole weekend the app has been acting up. Not logging food items in correctly and then switching the servings on its own. I tried reaching out to the developer haven‚Äôt received any response.   Get it together developer üëèüèºüëèüèºüëèüèº
It doesn‚Äôt even let me write my own weight the right way. Im from Europe so we use kg not lbs.

title: love this app!
body: Really easy too add food and workouts. I‚Äôve tried other apps and really didn‚Äôt like them, but this one has me hooked. The only thing I don‚Äôt like is when trying to access the recipes it wants me to get a membership. No, Honey no, I ain‚Äôt paying. Overall I really like the app.

title: Just wow
body: Sometimes it‚Äôs really hard for me to be encouraged to be healthy and to exercise. But this app has really made it easier for me to loose weight. My family suffers from obesity and now I feel like my best self. Thank you so much for this app.

title: Why I‚Äôm not happy with your program
body: I‚Äôm  choosing to count my calories.

title: It won‚Äôt let me edit my numbers
body: I am 6‚Äô3 and it was saying I was 6‚Äô0 I tried to fix this and everytime i move it im told ‚ÄúAre you sure that‚Äôs what you meant? Please try a different number. It‚Äôs the same with the weight it asks me to adjust it but I can‚Äôt because it gives me that same message like I‚Äôm supposed to weight .01 lbs or something.

title: Tracking is key
body: or whatever dj khalid said lol

title: Update your app!
body: Lifesum doesn‚Äôt do nearly enough bug fixes and updates to their app. I am enjoying the free version for the most part but the most annoying problem is when I spend 15 long minutes logging a meal from yesterday, it glitches and moves the entire meal to today. So then I have to add it all back in for yesterday with fingers crossed that it doesn‚Äôt repeat the same glitch. This happens every day so fix the app please!

title: Junk
body: At first I liked the app, but on the 6th day I tried to update my weight and suddenly all of my entries for the last three days were gone (weight, good, water intake). I tried to update  at least my weight for the previous days for the sake of tracking and it simple would not save my progress for previous days. I‚Äôve spent ten minutes trying to do something that simple and the app won‚Äôt let me. Also, no place for notes.

title: Change the Weight Settings
body: I am trying to lose weight but the app does not allow me to set my target weight because it is too low of a BMI value. Please change this because the weight I am trying to get to is still considered healthy to me and my doctor and using BMI as an indicator of what weight is healthy/unhealthy is outdated and misleading.

title: It‚Äôs ok
body: Since it‚Äôs a paid app I figured they would have more options. I don‚Äôt see many recipes options for paleo style I wish they had video tutorials on how to make some of these meals. They have wayyyyy to more fish  and shrimp options and for a person like me allergic to fish and shrimp I‚Äôm left with very little choices but even with the shrimp and fish they still don‚Äôt have that many varieties of food recipes

title: NEEDS A MONTHLY PAYMENT OPTION
body: This app is extremely appealing to me because of the sleek design and the simplicity of the app that also provides a lot of information but I was hoping that there would be a monthly payment option in which I would then purchase premium, but for the time being I will not use this app much.

title: Pretty but not practical
body: I originally downloaded this app because I like the graphics and organization of it all. I understand why the menus and plans are only available with upgrade to premium, but there is no reason why adjusting your macros or caloric intake on the classic plan should be a premium setting. I refuse to pay  for something I can find for free on the internet. Switching back to lose it.

title: Great but bugs and not regional to US
body: I love the app for its design and UX but some things are hurting it. First it does not match my local time. As a diabetic this is not great as it ruins my data I use to track my blood sugar. Second, being in America the recipe are difficult because they are not converted to our standard measurements, making them not very useful. If these things could be addressed I would be really happy with it!

title: Great interface, terrible food library
body: I really like the app interface and the feedback it provides based on food entries.  But the food library is terribly inaccurate.  Even when scanning barcodes, most entries do not match nutritional information on the food labels.  Yes, users can update library entries, but who has time to do that with every entry????  Not me.  Fix the library and I‚Äôll give it another try.

title: Privacy policy makes me sick
body: You charge people to use your service, and then use their data for marketing? What a joke. There is no reason to have to ‚Äúopt out‚Äù if it‚Äôs a paid service. What‚Äôs more if you valued your customers you would have a straight forward bullet point statement of what you collect, what you do with it, and how you protect the customer. Having to waste 10-15 minutes reading what you ‚Äúare not obligated to obtain consent‚Äù about is soulless corporate crap.

title: Love the app
body: Helps me lose weight by keeping track of my calories and giving me helpful hints along the way. Try it for a month and see how well you can do. It‚Äôs not easy, but you‚Äôll be proud of yourself for doing it.

title: Plans won‚Äôt open- app quits
body: I just added the Premium option for the Keto plan. When I hit plans, it goes to my home screen/app quits. Tried multiple trouble shooting steps- nothing. This is the whole purpose of paying for premium.  Disappointed.  The rest of the app is user friendly and well done. 3 stars and I‚Äôll keep using it.

title: This is the BEST!!!
body: I was always resistant to tracking my daily calorie intake. I absolutely love this food tracker! I find it really easy and user friendly. I‚Äôm hoping to keep it up until my lifestyle change is permanent. I highly recommend!!

title: Doesn‚Äôt work anymore
body: I really liked this app and I even bought the premium version before 1 week. But since a few days I have problems with the app. At first I couldn‚Äôt log in and they said that my account doesn‚Äôt exist. I created a new account and now I can‚Äôt use the premium version anymore. When I want to buy it they say that I already have the premium for one year but then I still just have the basic account.

title: Limited on Apple Watch
body: Biggest problem I have with this app is that they made it too fancy with breakfast lunch dinner and snack stuff, which it makes tracking more complicated. If they can tracking meals according to the time then life is much easier, for example if we eating from 5am- 11am that‚Äôs breakfast, after 12:00-4:00 that‚Äôs lunch. And after 5:00, is dinner.

title: Try, try again
body: I used this app a few years ago and ended up getting annoyed because the food info (even the ones that were ‚Äúverified by Lifesum‚Äù weren‚Äôt accurate. Since some time had passed I thought I‚Äôd give it another try. Nope. This could be an amazing app, but the inaccuracy in the food database is inexcusable. I spend more time trying to fix the data than I do adding data.

title: Wish it had more features
body: If a food isn‚Äôt in the diary you should be able to manually enter your nutrition facts. This only allows you to enter calories but if you are on Keto that doesn‚Äôt do you much good. This app also doesn‚Äôt have the feature to ‚Äúbuild a meal‚Äù that would be great for items you repeat weekly.

title: not worth the money
body: I would say there was about a 5% increase of ‚Äúgood‚Äù stuff on the app once you paid the $50 dollars to get premium. one reason i wanted to update because the way it was worded i thought i could pick a diet that was also vegetarian. instead, all the diets that were picked for me encouraged me to eat meat (low calorie high fat). theres not even a way to modify the plans with diet preferences or allergies so whats the point?! i cant even use it. such a waste of money.

title: Total game changer!!
body: I love this app! My husband I obsessively use the bar scanner. It us the best app we have ever used! An all in one app to track macros, food, exercise and keep you on track for your specific needs. We are on the keto strict and loving it! The premium is WORTH IT!

title: Good but limited.
body: I love how easy all the features are to use and the notifications are very helpful, but if you want to choose a diet plan aside from the traditional one you will have to pay and upgrade to premium.

title: App Malfunction
body: Hi! I love this app and everything about it so far. I have noticed one issue in the ‚Äúfood ratings‚Äù section where some parts of the descriptions are cut off. Not a huge deal but definitely something somebody looked over!

title: Great tracking app
body: I am really liking this app. I love how it remembers what you are previously instead of having to change the amount each day. One thing I would love to see in the app though would also be the net weight feature that MyPlate has.

title: Bizarre User Experience Decisions
body: Possibly one of the least user-friendly apps I have ever used in my life, and in this case, an example of the flaws of prioritizing style over substance.

title: Breastfeeding
body: This is an awesome app but I would love if it could be modified to include pregnancy and breastfeeding somehow. On average that burns around 200 calories per day and requires extra hydration also. Currently I just have to remember to add 200 calories to my daily allowance, which then shows me as over on calories for the day.

title: Can‚Äôt add food that isn‚Äôt on it
body: There‚Äôs some food that‚Äôs from local businesses that I eat and when I saw it wasn‚Äôt on the app I was like oh I‚Äôll add it like on MyPlate but I couldn‚Äôt find anything that did that so as nice as this app is since I can‚Äôt add foods I won‚Äôt be using it and I only started using it today.üòï

title: Something is wrong
body: I used this app over a year ago and it worked perfectly. I saw that there were new updates and went back to using the app.

title: Very friendly app
body: I love this app, absolutely user friendly! Downloads my workouts very easily, never had a problem unlike with other apps. Easy to find foods to track and delicious recipes. Strongly suggest, worth the price!

title: I lost 15 lbs in two months!
body: With this app, I've been able to lose weight and fight cravings. With the large barcode database, I get instant feedback on the food I'm eating (or thinking about eating)! All the heavy lifting in terms of rating my diet are done in-app.

title: Could use a couple things
body: I LOVE this app. Makes it really easy to meal prep.

title: Minor suggestion!
body: I love this app, and I‚Äôm using it to get healthier, but since it only listed limited allergies in the test, and you cannot put in things you are allergic to (for example, I‚Äôm allergic to strawberries) I get recipes for things I cannot eat.

title: Pretty app but horrible functionality.
body: I upgraded to premium and it was a huge waste of money if you are an American user.  The search function brings up obscure results, the measurements and calorie counts are never for average servings and I have to triple check every time I enter a food, very few recipes in the library, I‚Äôm so disappointed in this purchase.  I tried to get my money back and Apple said my purchase did not qualify for a refund.  DON‚ÄôT WASTE YOUR MONEY it‚Äôs a ripoff.

title: A little disappointed
body: I loved the app until I wasn‚Äôt able to input my own recipes and nutritional facts. I‚Äôm not going to eat strictly from the designed plans every time at every meal so there needs to be a way to substitute options when needed and I couldn‚Äôt figure out how to make the app do that so that was very disappointing.

title: When you get tired of other apps‚Ä¶
body: I used My Fitness Pal on and off for years. I eat better when I log food. There‚Äôs something different about Lifesum. I‚Äôm enjoying it and losing weight in the process.

title: WLS Patients
body: I think it would be super if you‚Äôd add a diet plan for weight loss surgery patients. I had the sleeve done 4 years ago. I‚Äôve gained a small amount of weight back but I can‚Äôt find any app that has diet plans with the type of portions we need.

title: Missing 1 thing for me
body: I find this app to be attractive, fairly detailed, but does not include a gluten free diet plan...or label markers for that matter.  If they had this one thing they‚Äôd get nothing less than 5 stars from me.  Maybe in time they will provide this.  If not, I don‚Äôt know if I‚Äôll stay premium.

title: Units of Measurement
body: I love almost everything about this app. My only issue is that although it lets you record your weight/height in whichever unit you prefer, it only displays weight in kg. I am used to lbs and it can be a bit confusing. It would be nice to be able to personalize that.

title: Misleading
body: I purchased the premium because it showed the personalized meal plans. However, the meal plans only change how your input is tracked. I thought it would actually give me a meal plan and what to eat and recipes for how to make it. If I wanted to simply track my food I would have stuck with MyFitnessPal since it‚Äôs been around forever and many foods are already logged in there.

title: Good app, one issue
body: For me, I‚Äôm trying to gain weight for football. As you know, this means I have to eat a certain caloric surplus each day. I am trying to eat around 300 to 500 calories more than I burn each day, but this function is hard to track with this app. It should include a feature allowing you to see your caloric surplus.

title: Love the tracking, hate the glitches
body: Love the app and its tracking function. I purchased the plan and once I started using it every time I try to go in the plan itself the app closes and I can not use the feature. Very frustrating as it was not cheap.

title: Great app
body: Great app for beginners. Helps to keep on track and stay motivated for first time keto dieters. Diet guidelines are very effective. I started Keto Burn last Tuesday and am I week I‚Äôve already lost 7 lbs without exercising. This has been the most successful diet I‚Äôve ever used and I‚Äôm never hungry.

title: Good app
body: This app is very easy to use. I just wish i could add the macronutrient breakdown to foods that I add to my Diary rather than just the calories. I also wish there was an option to adjust my calories and macronutrient goals for times that I want to carb cycle. That would make this app perfect.

title: Keto Diet?  Don‚Äôt Be Fooled:  $48/year
body: Unless you opt for an added cost subscription, i.e. $48/year, this diet app is nothing much more than a simple calorie counter.  Sure there are links to recipes but there are no ‚Äúplans‚Äù or meal suggestions available in the ‚Äúfree‚Äù app.  Also, no way to plug-in your own food recipes for simple entry/selection for subsequent meals.  A much better choice for a truly free diet monitor/calorie counter would be MyFitnessPal.

title: Keto
body: I‚Äôve tried three apps so far for tracking my keto lifestyle and I definitely enjoy using this one the most very simple to use and has more features than the other ones I have tried

title: Nice app but missing some essentials
body: I bought this app with the intention of connecting my Fitbit to it. Fitbit is listed as one of the health tracking apps that it can be synced to, but when I try to connect it I get an error message that says that Lifesum is not compatible with Fitbit. I‚Äôm not sure why Lifesum falsely advertised but it‚Äôs a shame because the app was very nice otherwise.

title: Question
body: Hi! The app looks great! I‚Äôve used it for one day, but I‚Äôve changed my mind. I would like a refund, but I attempted that through Apple(?) and they denied it. Thought I would try here. I‚Äôd be willing to pay a month, seeing I used it for a day. No other way to get a hold of anyone but to write a review. Thanks!

title: Not great
body: It has an excellent database for foods and nicely organized with a pleasant interface. My biggest gripe is it doesn‚Äôt sync well with Fitbit and kept deleting my workouts so when I would go in to log my food, I had no calories left to eat because it kept deleting my exercise. I realized this after starving myself all day afyer having had two workouts. Do it yourself sensibly.

title: Good app not as good
body: Looking up foods is harder in this app than other apps because the lists are not as extensively designed as other diet tracker apps. And the options for portion size are limited. I often use my fitness pal to really look up a food and the portion I need and then manually put it in this app. May stop using because of this.

title: Not easy to figure out!
body: After tracking a few meals, I realized that my previous app ‚Äú Lose It‚Äù was far superior in terms of ease of use. I emailed Lifesum asking for a cancellation of my premium plan and a refund and never heard back from them!

title: Great Alternative to MyFitnessPal
body: I had to give up on MFP when I kept having a glitch in the app. Frustrated, I downloaded Lifesum and was immediately glad to find no glitches and ease of use. My one big issue with this app is you can‚Äôt manually add macros for foods not in the database.....so any recipe I make I am out of luck. Super frustrating but overall a good app.

title: Like the app except for 1 thing
body: I like that the app offers different meal plans and a variety of food. The only thing that I‚Äôm not crazy about is the units of measurement. For example I wish it had the capability to covert to ounces instead of grams. Maybe there is a way, but I can‚Äôt find it.

title: Month by Month Subscription
body: I love the app so far, it‚Äôs a pretty good way to manage my weight and keep track of my calories. It‚Äôs a five star for me but I was wondering if there was a way to add a month by month subscription?

title: Great design, needs work on iPhone Pro Max
body: Some screens on this device have buttons placed in nearly untappable locations as they‚Äôre partially off the edge of the screen. Sometimes they‚Äôre not tappable at all so you just have to exit the app to reset to the app‚Äôs main screen.

title: Syncing issues after ios14 update
body: Ever since I updated my phone, I‚Äôve had issues with Lifesum not syncing to my Apple Watch data, like my exercise data. If I restart my phone it‚Äôll sync for a short time but my calories burned keeps going back to 0. Otherwise the app is visually appealing and relatively easy to use

title: Needs a social feature !
body: I love this app. I think the yearly price is great for what you get. - meal plans. Diet plans, tons of recipes, a lot are easy too.

title: Errors in barcode scanning feature
body: Disappointed that there are so many errors when using the barcode scan feature. You have to check each time to make sure the information is correct. One scanned item said 18 g of carbs when there was actually 0 carbs.

title: Broken HealthKit integration
body: Yet another shiny health app with nonfunctional Apple Health integration.

title: Great app
body: I have been using this app for months now and has really helped with my food intake, I have found it very helpful. Figuring out what type of foods I should be eating to be healthier! Since I had no clue what I was doing! I'm thankful I found this app!!!!

title: Not vegan friendly
body: This app is aesthetically pleasing and user friendly, but it‚Äôs not vegan friendly at all. When I log in a healthy food that just happens to be non-dairy and meatless it gives me a sad face! Even though that vegan item has plenty of nutritional value! Then the app displays a message that I should eat dairy! This app should be open to different diets.

title: Camera no longer available for free app
body: I wish I had not downloaded the upgrade.    I really enjoyed the camera feature,  now you have buy the premium version to use i.

title: Not all that glitters is gold
body: Looks great... that‚Äôs it! After using my fitness pal on keto for 4 months, I thought I‚Äôd try Lifesum because of the specific diet plans. After just a few days of upgrading to the premium plan where these diet guides are available I regret the purchase very much. The serving sizes tracking your daily intake is horrible, the exercise options to track is minimal. I wish I would‚Äôve just stuck with my free version of my Fitness pal.

title: Best app!
body: I‚Äôve downloaded about 10 different apps and this is the best! You can easily enter your food and you can easily see your progress! If it wasn‚Äôt free I would not think twice in buying it 11/10

title: So far so good & then some!
body: I usually hate food tracking. Too too much rigmarole. Lifesum is not only easy but it‚Äôs very encouraging as I move through my day. I just drank a glass of water! I am even discovering how to report meals that are a melange of ingredients.

title: Great app but Glitches
body: Great app so far! However in the last couple of days the app will close out on its own, sometimes in the middle of when I am entering my meals. Is this a glitch that you are aware of? How can I prevent this from happening? I just upgraded it to have a subscription so this is very inconvenient and a huge bummer.

title: Will not let me update weight
body: Good for keeping track of calories, but I‚Äôm not able to update my weight. It won‚Äôt sync weight from phone settings either. I googled it and many other users are finding this same problem. You would think that a weight loss app would have this sort of thing nailed down. Please fix this bug.

title: Very Hard to Add Custom Items
body: This app has many great features, but it is very hard to customize particularly when adding new foods. The option to add items is buried in Favorites, and the add wizard is limiting.  Additionally the UI/UX is really wonky in places on an iPhone X.  The barcode reader works about 50% of the time.  Would definitely benefit from some UX and QA expertise.

title: It‚Äôs... okay I guess?
body: It doesn‚Äôt do much besides track macros.

title: I don‚Äôt know what to do
body: Last night I purchased the yearly plan not aware that I would be paying the amount in full but it wasn‚Äôt until this morning when I checked and saw that my money was missing. I thought it would instead be taking out monthly payments or something of that sort. I don‚Äôt know what to do. Is there any possible way to get a refund?

title: Lifesum review
body: I really like this new app (Lifesum), but the first thing I‚Äôm finding out is my scale reads different depending on where I put it.

title: Two things...
body: This app has been great for me so far. Two suggestions: the weight tracker repeatedly jumps back to my starting weight, which also logs it incorrectly in Apple Health. Second, the ability to track water via Apple Watch would be huge.

title: Horrible‚Äî they‚Äôll continue to charge your credit card for no reason
body: I‚Äôve had a terrible experience with this app. Had it for less than 12 months and was charged multiple times without my permission. The app itself works fine but do not download unless you want to pay $150+ on random occasions for their premium version. Just wrote to customer service‚Äî hopefully they‚Äôll give me a refund.

title: Please fix bug :(
body: This app is fantastic and I love using it, but everytime I update my weight from the + tab instead of the me page it resets my weight back to my starting weight. It's really annoying because I can't undo it and it messes up my graph which I enjoy looking at. Please fix, this app is five stars otherwise.

title: Diet restriction and allergies
body: I love the meal plan and recipe‚Äôs, but there‚Äôs no way to filter out an allergy. For me I cannot eat any dairy because I‚Äôm allergic to it... and trying to be on keto and use the dairy-heavy recipes makes things difficult to an already difficult process.

title: Needs more recipes
body: Love this app, I just wish there were a few more recipes. I wish there was a build your own recipe option. For example there‚Äôs this honey chicken recipe I love but to log all the calories I have to log each individual item every time.

title: Lost premium status. Never got a response from their customer service.
body: I have decided to purchase premium subscription after reading positive reviews. I linked the account to my facebook account and after half a day, i lost the premium status.

title: Best looking app for tracking nutrients but...
body: 1. Apple Watch app is useless. Can‚Äôt look up and quick add foods from it.

title: Beautiful - but you get very little

Almost everything I try to do blocks me, and the monthly subscription fee is too much to be worth it. I'd recommend making it a paid app at this point, it will save folks time and energy.

title: Maybe a new feature?
body: I love the way this app helps me track my food intake. It has helped immensely keeping me on the keto diet. However it would be amazing if there ways a way to type nutritional information in for recipes that I find through other venues.

title: keeps crashing
body: So far, i‚Äôm really loving the app. It‚Äôs a great way to count my calories and make sure i‚Äôm eating right. However, i‚Äôve only had it a couple days. and this evening, it started crashing randomly. i want to add my dinner to the tracker, but it keeps crashing before i can do so. if fixed, you‚Äôll get five stars from me!

title: Great app but...
body: I‚Äôve been using this app for almost a week now and I like it. With that being said I really wish it gave you suggestions of things to eat that would help get your rating to perfect. Also I can see my friends meals but they are not able to see mine. There is no explanation as to how this works.

title: Deleted
body: Deleted because I can‚Äôt set my own calorie goals and I don‚Äôt want premium and it doesn‚Äôt even say if premium will allow you to do that. Even the free version of my fitness pal will allow you to set at least your own calorie goal and they give recipes for free. I don‚Äôt care about the recipes but I would like the basics of setting your on goals for calories, fat, protein, and carbs.

title: Works well, with room to grow
body: LifeSum is super clean and easy to use. It encourages healthy, stable management of your diet. That being said, I think there are a lot of translation errors and misspelled words in the recipes. The amount of recipes is somewhat slim, but I can see that they are working on that.

title: This app is amazing!
body: I‚Äôve told several people about this app and almost all of them have downloaded it. It‚Äôs so useful and makes counting calories so much easier! Definitely worth the download.

title: 5 stars for this
body: I like this a lot. Tracks your food if you‚Äôre over eating during a meal if you under eat. Tracks your steps, gives you really tasty recipes. Body measurements and tracks your weight.

title: Great app except....
body: I love this app in every way EXCEPT you cannot manually input meal information (calories, fat, protein ect.) and a lot of the options do not have the correct information and there‚Äôs no way to change it. MyFitnessPal allows you to do these things

title: Wow!!
body: This app is heaven sent! Can track my macros and it even recommends diets based off of my goals. The fact you can scan what you eat or see customized meals is crazy! Love it and highly recommend and I never leave reviews!

title: Disappointing
body: Everything is good except for one major thing! While on Keto you are suppose to count grams of carbs but minus the grams of fiber from your carbs which will give you your total ‚Äúcarbs‚Äù. Well this app does not subtract the grams of fiber from your carbs so the total carbs are WAY over your goal! It makes it so you deprive yourself from good carbs like veggies which you need in order to fuel, and it causes binging on bad carbs cuz the good carbs are so beyond lacking that you spiral out of control!

title: Recommended
body: It‚Äôs full of positivity. Tells you when you‚Äôre on track and gives you room to mess up. Super intuitive to use and has a large, up-to-date database of nutrition facts.

title: Not enough options for food tracking
body: I really liked the app initially, but a lot of the foods I wanted to track were just not available.  I could not even track plain rice, because all of the options were either 1 cup uncooked rice or ‚Äú1 serving‚Äù which could mean anything.. I ended up going back to MyFitnessPal, but I do really like the concept and design of this app!

title: Cool app but glitches
body: I really really like this app. My only Complaint is that the weight tracker switches back to your original weight unprompted so on the tracker it shows you go up and down up and down and it‚Äôs super annoying that i can‚Äôt delete those entries.

title: Trick
body: I hate this app I thought it was cool at first, but it took my money. I didn‚Äôt get to choose the plan and when I saw the plan it was $44 bucks that‚Äôs crazy for a app! And then when I tried to change it it already took my money, and I‚Äôm probably not gonna get it back. The app is not even worth it and I also thought it was gonna be  like a free 3 day or 7day trail but nope it just took my money don‚Äôt get this app there‚Äôs better ones out there .

title: Cute but horrible
body: When I downloaded this app I was excited that I would get fit so I started making a plan then I finished and it would not let me do so until I paid I pressed no but I automatically charged me  and it is ridiculous that you can‚Äôt use the app if you don‚Äôt pay I do not recommend this app for anyone and if you are willing to pay keep in mind they charged me without approval and it is not letting me cancel

title: Thank u
body: I have had thought that I should be more healthy but I never go through with it. I have been eating a lot of junk food and with this I‚Äôm trying to turn my self around and be more healthy and positive. So for that thank you and hopefully I can do this. : )

title: HealthKit Sync is Inconsistent
body: There‚Äôs been a lot of good thought put into the design and user experience of this app. The only issue is that the sync with Apple Health doesn‚Äôt work very well. I‚Äôve found other users have had similar issues; For me it worked for the first entry, then all the data was wiped from the Health app.

title: Expensive
body: I really like this app a lot. I think it is helpful to see what food you eat is healthy or unhealthy. But I just wish you didn‚Äôt have to pay to just see why it is unhealthy or what is in the food. I wish they can make that less expensive.

title: Beware macros
body: I really, really want to love this app. The interface is nice, but the recipes + macros provided don‚Äôt match. I‚Äôve been using the app for 4 days for keto. I have found 2 versions of the same recipe that are identical except the macros listed ü§∑üèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è. I‚Äôm also able to swap recipes in and out w no bearing on my daily macros...it seems like there‚Äôf be some kind of ‚ö†Ô∏è.

title: Some Major Bugs
body: This app would be a 5 star if some of the bugs would get fixed. There is a bug that doesn‚Äôt allow you to update your goal after you reach it, and another bug that unsyncs the apple health data even when it says it is synced. These need to be fixed ASAP.

title: Won‚Äôt work on Apple Watch
body: Im liking the app so far but I can‚Äôt get the app for the apple watch to work. It just tells me that it needs me to sign in on my phone. I am signed in on my phone and I have signed out and back in. Im wondering if the developers know what going on. Nothing on the internet seems to help with this simple problem.

title: Love this app
body: Love this app. A couple suggestions : add restaurants like other apps. It would also be helpful to be able to take before and after pictures to see our progress. Also the print is really small and I do wear eyeglasses, still tiny.

title: not worth the purchase
body: i really liked this app, until i purchased the premium version. i purchased the premium version because i liked the idea of it tracking my exercise automatically from my watch. but after several months the premium version has not worked consistently at all. i delete and re-download this app at least once a week to get the tracker to start working again. after contacting customer service they suggested that i refund my app before the refund period passed. doesn‚Äôt sound like they have any plans to fix this issue. so in short, great app. just don‚Äôt waste your money on the premium version.

title: I love Lifesum but...
body: I love this app, I use it every day. But one minor thing I have noticed is when I change serving size and update, the value changes back to whatever was value in the serving box. Just a minor bug I caught

title: Had High Hopes

The only thing that has me truly upset is that after I paid for a year‚Äôs worth of premium, if I try to choose a meal plan, the app crashes and I can‚Äôt see my meal plan. I need some sort of help because now I feel like my money is simply thrown away for a feature that I have no access to

title: Annoying
body: I was able to scan my products one day, but the next day it said that the products wasn‚Äôt working. Good thing I could just use what I scanned the previous day. Also, I was adding a product that didn‚Äôt exist, but I still can‚Äôt find it even if I‚Äôve tried to put it in the list 3 (!!!) times. Super annoying! I payed $30 for 6 months and I don‚Äôt feel that it was worth it at all... disappointed!

title: Only One Problem
body: As in the title, the only problem with this app is that for workouts, it only lets you write in workouts by time which can be kind of confusing unless it‚Äôs cardio.

title: Is it possible to have different calories amount on different day
body: Great app.

title: Worth the Subscription

title: Good start!

title: Okay

title: Crashing

title: Premium Subscription help
body: I canceled my premium subscription after one day, (February 2, cancelled February 3). I‚Äôm hoping I can either get a refund or reinstate my subscription. Would appreciate your assistance on where /whom to contact. Thank you!

title: Crashes quite often

title: No motivation to keep going

title: underweight

I‚Äôm pretty upset because I selected that I wanted to gain weight so if I want to gain weight I‚Äôm probably going to be a bit below average. Other than that it probably would have been a good app.

body: Love how easy this app is to use but wish it had a recipe import feature.  Whenever I input the nutrition values I get a poor food rating even though it is made with all Whole Foods.

title: Net carbs - ketogenic diet

title: Keeps me on track

title: Taking photo of the food

title: If you‚Äôre looking for a free app, keep looking
body: The interface is beautiful, but unless you upgrade to premium (a monthly subscription- not a one time purchase), this app offers very little functionality compared to other calorie trackers available on the App Store. The database leaves much to be desired compared to MyFitnessPal.

title: Glitch, will change if solved

This is really frustrating as I tend to make big meals for meal prep and have no idea what to put without the recipe option. Without the glitch I‚Äôd give it 5 stars, with I give it only 3, but I am rating it a 1 to get their attention.

title: Crashes randomly

I logged out and now I can‚Äôt log in anymore telling there‚Äôs something wrong with my internet connection (which clearly is fine since I‚Äôm writing this review). I‚Äôll keep it installed for a few days to see if an update comes through tho‚Äô.

title: Refund

I was hoping I could get a refund since they made me pay the $45 up front and not monthly like I thought. I used it for a week. And now I‚Äôm out $45 because of it.

title: I love this app

title: So far its great...but....
body: I‚Äôm enjoying this and possibly considering an upgrade but it doesn't have a widget and that would make it better for how I set up my phone. Similar apps are easier to use due to that feature. Sticking to free version for now.

title: Stopped working correctly
body: I loved this app but since the update it now crashes all the time or doesn‚Äôt let me in at all...I paid money for this so it‚Äôs inconvenient that it doesn‚Äôt even work 3/4 of the time anymore. I loved it before.

title: Why aren't the macros always customizable??
body: The app is good, I much prefer the interface on Lifesum to that of MyFitnessPal. HOWEVER: for anyone following a specific diet, there is no macro customization, and it counts TOTAL CARBS. So if you're lchf you cannot set a specific carb limit on the two Keto plans. That leaves you to the Standard Diet which then doesn't account for the fact that fatty foods are healthy. This app is a waste of your time and money, do not pay for it.

title: Needs improvement but will get job done
body: This app would be a lot better if it included vitamins and easier to find food on the search. I‚Äôve tested this one out but I‚Äôm going to back to MyFitnessPal. Cool app, very creative but spent too much time trying to search for food I just ate even from chain restaurants.

title: Poor College Student
body: I absolutely love this app over any other tracker! It‚Äôs pleasing to the eye and separates my macros into meals according to my calories! But to find all those delicious recipes and connect to my fit bit, I would have to pay $$ that I really can‚Äôt afford! But still good! üíï

title: Inaccurate
body: I pay for a subscription that allows me to track macros. However, I am unable to put in the exact macros I want to track.  They give me a ‚Äúscale‚Äù and it frequently skips numbers. For instance, today I need 155p/180c/55f. But I had to put in 154p/181c/55f. This is often off by 4g or more!

title: Very limited
body: I‚Äôm an athlete and I track macros. I also have food allergies. I‚Äôve used this app for three minutes and it‚Äôs completely unusable. I don‚Äôt need a plan with recipes because I don‚Äôt eat what everyone else can. I don‚Äôt want to upgrade to premium because you haven‚Äôt shown me the app is useful yet. I want a beautiful app with flexibility that puts MyFitnessPal to shame. You took all the unnecessary things from MFP and turned it into an app.

title: I luv it!
body: This app is spot on. It allows you to keep good track of what you‚Äôre eating.  The water part is the only drawback. You have no option of changing the amount-say to 12 oz. instead of 8.

title: Highly Deceptive Subscription Model
body: I‚Äôm concerned about the legitimacy of the in-app subscription advertisement. The 12 month subscription was described as ‚Äú$3.75 per month ... cancel anytime.‚Äù Immediately upon purchase I was charged $48 and my only cancellation option was effective January 30, 2020. False, or at best, misleading advertising like this should not be tolerated in the App Store. I‚Äôve requested a full refund. At that time, I would happily give the unpaid version of the app 5-stars.

title: Love the app BUT...
body: I just bought the 1 yr premium plan and I love it. However, I‚Äôm unsure about how the app syncs with Fitbit. It‚Äôs been a few days and the lifesum app is way off when I compre it to my Fitbit calories burned and steps. It would be fine if it was even by 500 steps but they are differences of up to 4,000 steps. Is there anything I‚Äôm doing wrong?

title: Food Diary
body: I had better luck finding food to add to my diary on the FitnessPal app. The calories for many of the same items vary greatly on here. I do like the sad or smily faces on this app though because it makes me think twice about how I‚Äôm choosing to acquire my calories.

title: Loving it so far.
body: I love the multiple built in diet plans. But can we have a auto fill coffee and creamer option? Coffee never changes I always drink the same amount just can‚Äôt be bothered to add it every day. ü§∑üèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

title: I Had High Expectations‚Ä¶

title: Amazing, life changer!
body: I absolutely recommend this to anyone. struggling to eat enough calories, this app tells me how much Is enough, or too little. I feel so much more in control of my eating! Thank you lifesum so much!

title: Great app, but there needs to be a way to type in calories.

I figured it was processing but an hour went by and it was still on the same page. I tried over and over again but no difference. I guess my weight broke it.

title: Seems cool

It‚Äôs not actually a monthly fee either, but a one time yearly fee. I don‚Äôt want to pay and then have to deal with trying to get a refund if I don‚Äôt like the app.

title: Great user friendly app!

title: Love love!
body: I love this app, I got the one year upgrade and started keto and it has helped me soooo much!!! I‚Äôve lost 20 pounds and counting. It gave me a great understanding of what is good for me, what macros are, just everything. I just love it! Thank you for helping me reach my goals!

title: Go Premium!!!
body: Count on the #1 thing with the app...‚ÄùGo Premium‚Äù for $44 bucks...follows anything you select to do.  Why don‚Äôt they just say $45 bucks or $3.50 per month.  Waste of time unless you are prepared to pay for it.

title: The best app ever for dieting
body: Love this app makes life so much easier for dieting and life style change lets you now were you won‚Äôt to be with everything and informs you of stuff that you are eating

title: Best app!
body: This app is amazing just been starting my diet it‚Äôs so helpful to see how much calories you have been eating ! And shows you great dinners that are good and healthy definitely recommend this app to everyone!!

title: Great app but DESPERATELY need a way to add foods
body: It‚Äôs a great app, it‚Äôs very visually appealing, but a lot of the things I eat are not on the database, and there is no way to add them to the database like you can in most other apps. You can add the calories, but that‚Äôs it, and I have to redo it every single time. It‚Äôs very frustrating and I may get a different app for this reason.

title: Most recent update broke the app
body: The most recent update broke the app. I can no longer input weight, height, plan info, other data or even restore purchases. The app basically doesn‚Äôt work. It shows every day only allowing 800 calories when my nutrition plan is 5:2 and should be 2200 cal and 600 cal. Also changing weight tells me I‚Äôm not the appropriate age and my height is stuck at 0‚Äô0‚Äù. Please correct all of these new bugs ASAP.

title: Very limited :(
body: As this seems like a very well thought-out app, and it is, I believe that as someone with a small budget, should people have to buy their way to health? You have to pay for recipes and plans which is in-fair and quite frankly discriminating against lower-class people. Please work on this.

title: i need a scale
body: i use this app but i sometimes forget what i ate so i cant always track the food. i also need a scale so i know how much i weigh. i dont like notifications and idk if they have them on this app. definitely get this app because i like seeing my progress. i dont have the paid version or premium or whatever you wanna call it but i can still see the chart where i gained or lost weight. its really cool to see that ive lost weight from where ive started!

title: Disappointed

title: Newbie loving it
body: I love this app! It‚Äôs easy to use and the smiley face guy is a great reflector to remind me how I ‚Äúwant‚Äù to feel!

title: Dear Lifesum
body: I love the app it‚Äôs beautiful and it‚Äôs effective. I‚Äôm a single person and not cooking for anyone but myself

title: Keeping me on track
body: As much as you pay for this app, I should have the option to enter my recipe and amount of servings and it should give the nutrition info.  Then let me add it to my meals from there.  Please make this an option.  Other than that, and it‚Äôs a biggie,  I love the app.  Thanks for keeping me on tracküòÜ

title: Loving it
body: I started the keto diet and loved this app then most. I want to buy the premium, but wasn‚Äôt sure if you have to pay the whole amount, or do you get charged per month $3.75 a month???

title: Amazing
body: This is the second tracking app for Keto I have tried and I love it. It has a ton of features and I can use it on many of my Apple platforms. Easy to use, add new foods, & add new recipes. The tips are great too and motivating.

title: Yep it looks nice and it‚Äôs pretty interactive....
body: ...but it still doesn‚Äôt allow for customized meal entry. Unless I‚Äôm missing something, I can only add caloric content and not protein, carbs, or other detailed info on meals that can‚Äôt be captured by search, barcode, or beta camera feature.

title: Great app
body: Functionality is great. The wish I could change font size and especially the color of the dashboard. The great makes it hard to read.

title: Misleading subscription
body: The subscription information is extremely misleading. It shows what you will be paying every month, but charges you in full for the year! There‚Äôs also very little vegetarian options. I cancelled the subscription without 2 minutes and emailed customer support for a refund, however they take an extremely long time to answer emails.

title: Needs more food options
body: The diary needs allot more food options and a stronger search engine to nail a much higher degree of accuracy for the user. ‚ÄúGetting close‚Äù shouldn‚Äôt be an option. It needs to be accurate, because the Lifesum guide returns the favor with ‚Äúaccurate‚Äù critiques based on the food entered.

title: Faster!
body: Thank you for finally making the app launch faster. That was a big pet peeve of mine. I‚Äôd still like see a better search for foods. There is a lot of incorrect items and reporting them never seems to do anything.

title: Where's the Paleo Option?
body: This is a really neat app, and I'm trying to get back to a paleo diet. I thought an app might be a good way to hold myself accountable. Buuuut, the closest thing to paleo is the keto diet. So if you search recipes that are paleo, you will only find 1. I like everything else about the app. :)

title: Height stuck at 6'12"

I could change it to 5'11" and 6'1" just fine but it seems entering 6'0" is bugged. 5'0" does work so it's not the 0 that's doing it. Please fix this, I'll just use 5'11" for now.

title: I find this app repugnant
body: I downloaded this app and took the quiz to find my ‚Äúbest‚Äù meal plan and it told me to fast for two days. Telling people to not eat is NOT healthy. I find this app repugnant. The ‚ÄúNutritional Advisor‚Äù said ‚Äúwhen you befriend your hunger, you can lose weight without changing your lifestyle‚Äù. What??!! If this is really what you are telling people and saying it is healthy you should rethink your entire life.

title: Great looking app! Database needs work.
body: I love the functions and looks to this app. So clean!  The only thing I would like to see is a better database. I know it my require help from people who use it, but when you pay for premium you expect a little more. I have had to create a lot of foods already.

title: Awesome
body: I‚Äôve been looking for an app I feel like I would say consistent with. I really like this app I wish the life score was in the free subscription though. Or at least give a free trial to see if I‚Äôll want to pay for the other features. Other then that it‚Äôs cool

title: Enjoying it!
body: Great app, lots of recipes and easy to use. My only suggestion would be to add the ability to have a custom planning section where I could set my own macro nutrient and calorie goals.

title: Refund
body: Hello, I‚Äôm rating this a 5 star due to the set up, however, it‚Äôs not the type of app I was looking for. Can I receive a refund for my purchase? I purchased and cancelled the same day. Thank you!

title: Functional but could be better
body: It gets the job done and help track things halfway decent. The goals it sets are not clearly defined and potentially confusing. You have to read the fine print of the goals to actually know what you need to be doing (is it a maximum or minimal goal?).

title: Food tracking not accurate!
body: You would think an app that you have to purchase would have a decent list a foods already pre saved! Most of the food items have inaccurate nutritional info. They don‚Äôt have your basic fast food menu items! I have to google the info and then input into the app.

title: Won‚Äôt sync workouts.
body: Used this for some time, it used to easily sync workouts. For some reason this summer they won‚Äôt sync correctly. They will show up for just a minute than disappear. Then I‚Äôll manually enter calories burned and the workout matching those cals will reappear, then disappear when I delete the duplicate manual entry.

title: Can‚Äôt do much without purchasing premium
body: I was unable to input my macro daily goals without purchasing their premium option.  I ciuld see needing premium for recipe ideas, or coaching tips, but just being able to input my daily targets seems like something that should be given.

title: Okay app
body: I would have paid for the app to use for a year if it didn‚Äôt have an automatic renewal. I wish I could add my own water bottle size. It only goes up to 16.9 oz and I have a Hydro that‚Äôs 24oz, so I have to keep track in my head, then add them after I‚Äôve drank a couple. It‚Äôs very inconvenient.

title: Small glitch
body: So when viewing a food inside a recipe that you‚Äôve added to your meal (breakfast/lunch/dinner), at the top the default ‚Äúback‚Äù back arrow appears at the top shifting the interface down. Fyi.

title: Delete your other apps and go premium
body: By far the most comprehensive nutrition tracker. I recommend it to Anyone wanting to lose weight, cleaning up their diet, or following a specific nutrition plan.

title: Everything is VIP
body: I like this app, but almost everything on this app is VIP only, recipes, looking at your daily rating, getting insights on the food you eat, etc. I understand that this app needs to make money, but making the most crucial parts of the app cost money isn‚Äôt the way to do it.

title: No support
body: This app is okay the premium is not worth it. I got the premium version a year ago at discounted rate then no one informed me about my upcoming $45 renewal charge that just occurred. I have tried to contact multiple times to cancel and be refunded however, I just keep receiving responses that there are longer wait times but it‚Äôs been several DAYS. I am extremely dissapointed with the lack of customer service.

title: Not very user friendly
body: I bought a subscription to this app thinking that it would allow me to set my meal plan and give me a grocery list like it offered but it doesn‚Äôt work. Also all the measurements are in grams and so I have to constantly use a conversion calculator to make the recipes. Too inconvenient. I wish I could get my money back. Also you can‚Äôt add your own recipes and calculate the nutritional values.

title: Great app
body: Lifesum is an excellent way to track your calorie intake, exercise, and do much more. However, think it would be better if it tracked your sugar intake, and but just calories, fat, and carbs. Other than that, it is a great app! Definitely would recommend.

title: Good app
body: This is a really good app.  My only con is that to get some valuable nutritional information like cholesterol intake you have to pay a subscription fee.  Other apps provide this kind of info in the base app.  In addition, it‚Äôs not just a one time fee.  Other than that it works pretty seamlessly with my series 4 Apple Watch.

title: Food Diary hard to navigate
body: I chose this app because it had a selection of plans, but most of it‚Äôs food portions are measured in grams. When you are looking for a tablespoon or other common American measuring, it is often not there. So, I‚Äôm spending too much time trying to figure out the portion size.

title: The problem is gone now!
body: I‚Äôm able to do what I want to do on it, without it going back to the home screen! Now that it‚Äôs problem free for me, this app is fantastic and very helpful!

title: Helps me stay on track
body: I love that this tells u how many suggested macros per meal. I wish it had a section that u could look up foods before u planned them so that you would know what your counts were going to be and plan better.

title: Annoying
body: I hate apps where I get bombarded over and over to upgrade features. They will wear you thin like old pop up ads did. The function of this app if you are not getting premium is to enter in food for tracking. If it was just that, I‚Äôd be happy, but they‚Äôve made it obnoxious by essentially creating one big commercial. Delete.

title: Love my app
body: Love this app it‚Äôs easy to use and they give you great pointers. If you find yourself not liking any other diary food apps I would definitely recommend this one to start off with

title: Great App!
body: My friend recommended this app to me. I decided to download it and I really enjoy it and is my favorite health app so far. I even paid for a premium membership so I can enjoy all the options they have on there! (:

title: Almost there
body: Everything with the iPhone app is perfect but it would be even better if you changed the Apple Watch app so that I could update how much water I drink or add quick calories or something like that

title: More options
body: I am not able to get Premium So I think it be better if people who don‚Äôt have premium have more options so just to be able to look at how they‚Äôre doing on their bit also be shown ways to fix it.

title: Helpful
body: I love this app. It breaks down your macros and what you should be eating Caloric-wise for each meal. I also love the fact that it rates each meal giving you a smile or frown letting me know which meals or snacks keep me on track.

title: Great app could use some improvements
body: Needs to allow tracking or sugar alcohols like sorbitol etc... also needs to work better with Fitbit for sync. Not consistent and apple health.

title: I‚Äôm very upset
body: I am 12 years old and I am trying to eat healthier. The app says 12+ I don‚Äôt think they should put it as 12+ if they are going to decide for me on if I‚Äôm old enough to eat healthy. And I‚Äôm not going to lie about my age because I wanted a true answer it‚Äôs not like I‚Äôm trying to starve myself I‚Äôm trying to cut out unnecessary sugar and I would like help remembering and tracking so I can look back and see improvement.

title: Crash on iPhone 7
body: It went ok when I first downloaded it and it got stuck at some point but still can be used. But now, it crashes a lot more. Sometimes it goes black screen and not responding. I‚Äôm on iOS 11.0.1. And please add feature to remove product from scanned barcode.

title: WAY BETTER THAN MY FITNESS PAL
body: Literally best macro and overall fitness tracker.

title: Auto charge
body: I got a free trial for this through my health insurance. I tried it out but it doesn‚Äôt have enough recipes etc. It‚Äôs not great so I stopped using it then of course I get auto renewed for it. I realize many companies do this but it doesn‚Äôt make it any less sketchy. They say it‚Äôs more ‚Äúconvenient‚Äù for you - really all they hope for is exactly this - you‚Äôll forget to cancel and they can take your money.

title: Can‚Äôt find exercise settings
body: Love this app but as of today the option to track calories you‚Äôve burned from exercise has disappeared. Please help.

title: So far, not bad
body: So far I like it. I like how it shows how many calories for breakfast, lunch and dinner to each around. Since I‚Äôm trying to count my Marco nutrients I really like how it just shows the fats, protein and carbs up front without me trying to search for it.

title: Beautiful but not functional
body: There was super excited to see a nutrition app that‚Äôs well designed but this thing also has a MINOR portion of the function / efficacy that other ones do. Nothing scans (trust me, I‚Äôve tried all the beverages in my fridge in good lighting) and the options are limited. Much of functionality appears to be locked behind premium paywall

title: Nice to look at, but inaccurate.
body: It‚Äôs not here or there. I have to double check everything I scan into the app because most of the foods in their database are extremely inaccurate. It would have really great potential if it didn‚Äôt have this major flaw.

title: Can‚Äôt log in
body: I was enjoying using this app and then all of a sudden I couldn‚Äôt login one day. I tried resetting my password but never got an email from Lifesum. I then sent an email to their customer service more than a week ago and haven‚Äôt heard back. There apparently is no number you can call so I‚Äôve requested a refund with Apple.

title: Overpriced, underdeveloped
body: I tried the app and thought it was useful for a while. Typing in items and getting what I thought was a generally correct tabulation of nutrients and calories.  The more I used it the more random I realized the numbers were. I stopped using it and deleted from my phone. Then a year later they charge me $45 to renew per some fine print when I did the free trial.  They refuse to refund the money. Scam.

title: Wasted my money on a subscription

When you search for an item very random foods come up rather than common foods. The only way I can actually track my food is if I scan every barcode which is not practical. I requested a refund but of course they cannot help out.

title: Lifesum

title: No way
body: I downloaded this app just so I could submit a review. Before downloading any app I always read the reviews and see how the developers respond. After reading the reviews and seeing how the developers responded to people arrogantly in my opinion I refuse to download an app where the developers blatantly tell people we‚Äôre just not gonna do that when it has been strongly requested by the users so bye-bye life sum you lost my money

title: Simply Smart

title: Very helpful

title: Time entry‚Äôs need to be added

title: Nice app but doesn‚Äôt work

title: Great app

title: I like it

title: Love it!

title: It works but...

title: Not accurate
body: This app is gorgeous, and visually you want to use it. That being said, if you are using this app to truly track you‚Äôre intake I do not advise it at all. I have found NUMEROUS foods that‚Äôs are incorrect. Foods that are ‚Äúverified‚Äù with the check mark that are wrong, also tried scanning barcodes, also are almost always wrong. The food database is just so inaccurate that it‚Äôs hard to overlook. Back to MyFitnessPal for me.

title: Good App but confusing personal recipes
body: I love this app and I use it everyday, my only complaint is that‚Äôs it‚Äôs very difficult to find where to make your own recipe/meal. I wish there was an easier way to find the feature.

title: It‚Äôs okay...

Plus, you can‚Äôt design your own custom meals within the app, you can only choose name brand food. Or a barcode.

title: Used to love, but now must pay or crash

The new updates now cause the app to repeatedly ask me to pick a paid plan. When I click out of the paid plans the app crashes. It forces you to choose one of their diet plans, which, isn‚Äôt what I wanted. The plans are nice but extremely limited, most of them for 7 days. Because the developers are Scandinavian, for those in the YS, many of your regular foods can‚Äôt be found in the database.

title: It‚Äôs alright?

I also think it‚Äôs pretty frustrating when I workout and want to eat a ‚Äúlarger meal‚Äù instead of a small meal and then multiple snacks that I can‚Äôt.

title: i love this app but...

title: üòì

title: Issues with update

title: Great app, but some new features are needed.

title: Really nice

title: Used to be
