body: I upgraded my Lifesum to get the speciality diets - currently doing "Fat-Burner Light" and it's amazing to be able to see where I'm with my macros and it gives great tips and recipes for helping to cut cravings and stay on track.

title: This makes me set goals and keep them
body: Practical, user friendly. This app helps me keep track of my calorie intake and gives me the organization and motivation to lose wait.

title: Steps =/= Calories
body: The step to calories on the exercise portion of the app seems to be off. I walk 27 steps and it says I burned 57 calories. By the end of the day it says I burned 1000+ calories just by walking which isn't accurate. I usually get 500 tops. It really messes up the calorie counting and makes me feel like I'm losing track.

title: Love the app but...
body: This app is great for tracking all my healthy food and keeping up with my calories, but recently, I tried to update my weight and it wouldn't let me select a weight above 9 lbs. I could only select 0.1-9.9 lbs so right now, apparently, I weigh 1.3 pounds. Please fix this!!

title: Disappointing
body: I really liked the app before I downloaded the update. Now meals disappear and the calendar gets messed up for past days. I also can't find the custom calorie option anymore. The barcode scan is not working properly, won't scan products anymore that worked before. For me the app became pretty much useless because I can't count on the data anymore that I put in. I'm really disappointed.

title: Not at all intuitive
body: I was a Gold member of the old ShapeUp club for two years, then went into hibernation for a year.  When I returned to Lifesum, although the appearances look prettier, the product is almost impossible to use intuitively.  There are also many, many, just bugs (e.g. selecting US measurements but seeing only Kg in weight and food values.  The product has declined in usefulness over the last year and I had to give up using it.

title: Decent but downgrades usability to push Gold membership
body: I wanted to use this app to track calories and not to do one of their diets. It's fine that they push the Gold membership on you, but what isn't cool is that they hamper the usability by only letting Gold member do a quick add of their recent or

title: Bugs everywhere!
body: I signed up for the Gold Account and used it for 2 days and was disappointed at the number of bugs I encountered. Some highlights: Water Intake automatically setting itself to 8 cups, Meals being duplicated, daily calorie allowance changing for no reason, inaccurate weight chart showing current weight duplicated... Don't waste your time with this app and definitely don't waste your time and money upgrading to Gold!

title: Doesn't save data
body: Latest version is really buggy. When you enter exercise and water, they aren't saved to the right day. Often the app saves them to the day before, and when you try to correct them you'll see them doubled up on another day. Very frustrating for paid subscriber. Won't renew if this isn't fixed.

title: Idea!
body: What if you had a disease that affected your health? Wouldn't that change your lifestyle? Add a setting for that, and let the users type in their health issue! It would make their diet and stuff change so that it would make more sense! Just an idea.

title: Love
body: This is the only app where im able to track my food for weeks before getting bored. Other ones i used to quit within a week or two.

title: MyFitnessPal wannabe
body: It is way prettier than MFP, that's for sure. Not sure if it's easier to work and navigate since I've been using MFP for over a year now, but it wasn't too tough to figure out. My problem is that 1) to lean out it had me eating too few calories for my output level and had me eating 50% Carbs/30% Fat/20 % Protein (anyone that tracks macros knows that's way too little protein) and 2) I couldn't customize my macro goals.

title: Great but expensive
body: I love this app and everything it can do for you! Sadly, there is a premium version that lets you do much more but is very expensive. The cheapest you could pay is around $40 per year, which I am not willing to spend :/

title: Wanting to get this app but unsure
body: Hey guys I want to get this app and plan on getting the 12 month subscription. What I'm wondering is if I will pay the 3.74$ a month or will I pay the 44$ and then not have to pay again? Just curious. Thanks!

title: Love it!
body: I'm already losing weight and what an easy way to track your food and excercise! Much better then weight watchers online subscription and less expensive too!

title: Why is the barcode scanner not working?
body: I love this app. It helps he remember to eat. It also reminds me what I have eaten. I love it but today the barcode scanner stopped working. The screen just stays black. I know it's not my camera cuz I checked it. Please fix it so I can rate this a 5.

title: I like it, very easy to use, but...
body: There should be more generic food choices that you can add your own nutritional info and ability to change water consumption size amounts. Not a biggie but adding option to snap photos of foods would put this app at the top of all other similar apps. Overall, nice work!

title: Very easy to use & effective
body: As someone who is moderately active and looking to become more active and healthy, I find that lifesum is a very straightforward and staple app. It allows easy food, fitness, and water tracking, as well as helpful recommendations for maintaining a healthy life style.

title: Helpful
body: I love that it's so helpful even without premium. I would prefer more of the premium features without the entire cost, but it's helped me lose weight while being healthy.

title: Gorgeous, easy to use, and fun!
body: I love taking my food, but sometimes apps make it feel like a chore. This app makes me excited to log my food, and the interactivity always means that there's something new to do!

title: Great App Overall
body: I have found this app to be very helpful. The only complaint I have is the lack of recipes for certain diets, and misinformation listed when scanning foods. Other than that it is great!

title: Love this app!
body: This app is amazing, it makes tracking your calories and macros so easy and it really keeps you accountable. Love how you can just scan the barcode on the food you're eating! Simple and fun.

title: Love it!
body: I love that it gives me feed back on my food choices. I don't have to subscribe to adjust my macros like other apps. I love that the subscription does allow me to track sugar, sodium, body fat percentage, etc.

title: Nice app but...
body: I like the app but the food database needs a lot of work. I deleted this app last year because of this issue and I tried it again in hopes it'd be a little better. The barcode scanner also needs more accuracy. It will either give me the wrong food but the right calorie count/measurement or the right food wrong calorie count/measurement.

title: Problems adding foods.
body: While there are many nice features to the program, I have difficulty adding new foods to the database. Oftentimes the program simply crashes out in the middle of adding a new food.  This is frustrating, and I suspect is reasonably common, as it is very rare to find shared updates to the food database for download.

title: Awesome, but slightly inaccurate.
body: Perhaps I just need to upgrade, but the only complaint I have about the free version is that I can't input specific weight training exercises, i.e., leg extensions, bicep curls, etc. The only option is "Machines, Heavy." I don't know what constitutes as heavy, but I appreciate the ego boost, Lifesum.

title: Love this app
body: I love that this app gently show you the direction you should go in to reach you weight goal. It shows how many calories per day you should consume to & what areas you should be eating them. I just love it

title: Great app, needs a little work
body: This app is awesome, I love the setup and recipes, but it definitely has some minor issues and optimization that could be done.

title: Biased grading of meals
body: This app had the potential to be amazing. It's beautifully designed and aesthetically pleasing. Easy and fun to use. However the grading system seems unfair. I could have a very greatly breakfast which earns me an "A", but as soon as I drank an 8oz glass of orange juice, Unhealthy! Chicken and rice with an Apple? "C". I don't think the grading system is very balanced. I would recommend having true nutritional experts weigh in on the grading of meals.

title: Love this app
body: I have been religiously using this app after I found this as one of top rated apps on iTunes. This has helped me achieve my fitness goals. Lost 13 pounds in a month by keeping track of diet and fitness. Thanks Lifesum

title: Lot of Potential
body: I really want to love this app, it has a lot of potential but isn't there yet. The nutritional database is very sparse and often incorrect and it does not recognize a great many barcodes.

title: Must read
body: We all understand that it is not 100 percent accurate.

title: Like it so far
body: I like this app more than the others I have use but Im on a keto diet and the app does not count net carbs because of that healthy stuff come out to be with a sad face! I wish that could be fixed.

title: Potential
body: Started just fine on my iPhone 7 (with latest updates) for a whopping ten minutes...  now it opens and crashes.   And help?  Directed by the developer to go to support within the app.   How are we supposed to do that when the app crashes almost immediately?   Disappointed because I was excited at its easy setup...

title: Agree... Great idea but unreliable/buggy!
body: If I could actually rely on this app to sync consistently with the iPhone app, as well as enable quick updates from the watch it'd be great. But, you can't... It crashes, freezes and is rarely responsive from the watch interface. I really like the integration across other apps, as well as the user interface, but without a reliable watch app it's somewhat of a nuisance.

title: Meh
body: There are already so many apps that counts calories and activity etc. the thing I was looking forward to in the app is the health grade thing but they are mostly don't make sense and you can't get an explanation with out an upgrade, maybe they should consider a brief trial because why the hell should I pay for something I haven't seen. Finally I am not sure if it my imagination but the food database looked French based.

title: Best fitness app imo
body: For someone trying to gain weight and eat more and stay healthy this app is by far the most user friendly. It's also the most interactive and has a fresh design. This app can use some additional features though.

title: Almost there ‚Ä¶
body: This is a beautiful app and very easy to use. The UI is bar none the best out there. The food grade is helpful not sure how accurate it is but non the less gives you an glimpse why it's a D grade. My ONLY gripe is the weak food database. They need to seriously fix this

title: FitRJ
body: This app keeps me motivated to work and input every day. The recipes, water tracker, and easy integration from my FitBit and RunKeeper activity makes it my personal fitness buddy that keeps track of everything I need.

title: Lazy updates
body: Pros:

title: My money
body: I I'm super mad you charged me 50 dollars from my apple account and I didn't even no I was going to be charged and I just downloaded this app please I want my money back I need it stop ignoring my massages

title: Fantastic app
body: Does what it says it does. After only a few days with the app, I'm already more health-conscious and knowledgeable about what I'm putting in my body than I've been in months.

title: AMAZING!!
body: This app has helped me eat better and exercise way more. I'm noticing changes in my body I would've never seen without Lifesum! Your neals and exercises are very easy to list. I absolutely recommend it üòçüòå‚ù§Ô∏è

title: I love this app
body: This app is so helpful that I bought the extended app. In this first week of using The Energizer I have lost over 7 pounds! My daughter has just started using it as well! Will update as time goes on.

title: Was great, until Points tracking was removed
body: Well, I downloaded this app on Jan 12th, the same day I started Weight Watchers, since I could track points.  The most recent update stated it was for, "important issues," but removed the points option.  Had I know that I wouldn't have updated it.  Up until that point I would have given it four stars... now, none due to sneakiness and loss of a great feature.

title: LOOOVE THE IDEA! UPDATE
body: I still love the app, I even actually sprung for the premium! It's ALMOST there but it is missing a few key features even with the premium. They have a small database of foods and the servings sizes are just difficult. I've gotten frustrated over the last few days. I LOVE the idea...just keep going, much to added.

title: helps me so much
body: everyday it helps me to not eat as much and to be concerned about how much food I am eating! and it tells me how many calories I should burn in order to eat more! truly wonderful

title: Step counter needs to be fix.
body: The app is overall very good. But the step counter is inconsistent. It started off working very well but now it's all over the place. Some days it'll show how much calories I lost and some days it'll say 7 calories burned even though I took 6,000 steps

title: Great phone app, iPad Pro needs help
body: It would be great if the app wasn't locked to portrait mode. This makes it impossible to use it on an iPad Pro with a keyboard attached. It's a minor change which would let me have a permanent "station" in my kitchen to easily add my meals.

title: Lifesum
body: The minute I got it I loved it. I had been using another app to keep track of my calories and what I was eating but LifeSum is just so much better and gives me what I really want to see!!

title: don't use if not trying to lose weight
body: Unless you get premium this app is hard to track if you're deficient in something. Since I'm a vegetarian I needed something to track if I was sticking to my diet but this doesn't help in the slightest. But beside those negatives, one positive was the recipes were amazing!

title: Food Library isn't as good as Lose it
body: The food library is okay. It isn't as good as the lose it app. They have so many brands and options compared to Lifesum. It's okay having the protein calculated and I love how bright the app is, but I think Lose it gives me more accuracy although it isn't as pretty

title: Best out there
body: This is by far my fovorite app for staying healthy and keeping track! I use it with a written daily planner and sticking to a healthy eating working out routine has never been easier!

title: Bug ;c
body: I really like the app and all the features (of the premium version) but there is a bug and I really can't do anything now ;c please solve this problem quickly!

title: love it
body: I've just been using this for fun, but I can already see a difference in my body. I was just surprised to find that there was a Mexican food section automatically included, but not an Asian one. I'd think both would be pretty standard!

title: Latest update is awful...
body: I have been using this app for four years and loved it.  But the latest update is awful.  The graphics are beautiful, but the function is gone.  Lost all my added foods, can't search shared foods on-line, can't copy from a previous day, everything takes more steps.  I'm going to switch to another app even though I lose my historical data.  It's that bad!  Too bad.

title: This app! üëç
body: This is the push I've been waiting for to help me lose 10 pounds, so far it's working well. I love that it tells me if I should eat more so I'm not hungry through out the day. üëç Overall great app. üòÅ

title: Very helpfull but too pricey
body: Trying to gain a few pounds and keeping track gives awesome results. Unable to track the rest id things we eat like vitamins, etc. Also a little too pricey. Will delete once free days are up.

title: Glitchy
body: Absolutely hate it! It's has a nice user friendly look but it's slow, barcode scanner brings up wrong items, and it freezes. The paid diets aren't extensive, nothing you couldn't find on Pinterest. They also don't account for vegetarianism/pescatarians or the like. Makes no sense paying for three diets and additional stats that would be available for free in other apps. Deleted!

title: Great but could be better
body: I love this app. But it would be great if they allowed one to input more that just sodium, cholesterol... I mean putting in  things inside vitamin supplements. There is no category for them, so although their good for the body the app marks it as D, not too many nutrients.

title: Good
body: So far so good I like the calorie tracking if you want to lose weight . I hope they keep making it better and updating , love the quality graphics .

title: User for a couple of days.
body: So far so good. Lots of pre programmed food to record, looks great, and syncs well with my other health apps. Also this app has great recipes for a small sub.  Hope to loose some weight soonüòâ

title: Good App but Buggy.
body: I truly like this app but at the moment it's still quite buggy hence my two stars rate. I've reported to their customer service and they reply me fast and with a good explanation. I hope their software engineer is fixing this issues ASAP and new update will be release soon. Looking forward to use this app more often in near future.

title: Great!!!
body: This app is great. Although sometimes I wish it had a bit more information on some foods or some foods or brands aren't on there. But otherwise it is the best food tracking app there is.

title: Pretty Good
body: Pretty good app. Only thing is I have to make a few exceptions to certain things for my level of training. However, for the most part it helps me keep track of nutritional needs and goals for the day.

title: Took away the one feature I loved
body: The reason why I started using this app over myfitnesspal was the daily ratings. I mean the user experience is a better better but once the daily rating became subscriber exclusive, I lost the commitment I had to consistently use this app.

title: Works great until I press on My Profile...
body: Everything works wonderfully until I try to select my profile. The app closes when ever I press on the profile button. I've restarted my phone& deleted the app and reinstalled it. Nothing seems to work. Please fix!

title: I Would Like Some Improvements
body: I really find this app useful . It personalizes to any 13+ age which is really great . I would really like a setting in which I could complete my diary and get a prediction on when i would reach my goal weight

title: I wish I hadn't bought the membership...
body: Apple really should think about allowing users to upload screenshots of problems. This app has a hysterical bug that renders it and my subscription I just purchased completely useless. According to the exercise tracker I've put in, at last check, over 109 miles walking today. Yeah, that's not the case. So it's throwing everything off. Please fix this :(

title: Great food diary and fitness app
body: I like looking at food from a good for you standpoint not just calories in, calories out. I love the update adding the amount of veggies and fruit I need each day, especially the dancing broccoli üëå

title: A MUST PURCHASE
body: I've loved this app to track my goals. It shows where and how I can improve. The app is user friendly. I have premium and thinks it's the best thing I've bought to reach my goals.

title: love it but it's glitchy
body: ok so i've been using the app for only a week now and it's super helpful!!! my favorite feature was the "day rating" but.. that seems to have stopped working suddenly. now there's just a green tab that says "day_rating_diary_rating_ready_button" and obviously that's not supposed to be there. it won't let me see what my rating is for today or any other day, when i click on it the calendar opens. i've tried reinstalling the app and restarting my phone. please fix this !! i'd really to be able to see my day rating again :)

title: Not loving the new update
body: I've had this app for a few days & was loving every part of it, but the new update for the apple watch removes all of the interactivity that was available and makes the watch almost useless.  Please remove the avatar and revert back to the old version and I will definitely change my review back to 5 stars!

title: Great app
body: Not only does it track you, but it sends you motivational messages too. It gives you a detailed health plan to fit your specific needs.

title: Great idea. Terrible execution.
body: I want to like this app, but can't. It took three tries to setup my profile. IShape is slow, buggy and doesn't work. The food percentages are wrong, and adding food doesn't seem to work right.   There are numerous spelling mistakes throughout the app. I'm going to put it on the shelf. Hopefully an update will be usable, otherwise I wasted $10.

title: Not so much
body: I used this app everyday for almost 6 months and then it stopped letting me "create food". So every time I needed to add a food that wasn't in the database, I had to get on the computer and add it. I like Myfitnesspal way better, because you can scan the barcode on whatever you eat and add it that way.

title: So fun and useful!
body: After 90 days on MFP I switched to lifesum and love it so much I wish I had used it in the first place. It's super easy and artsy (especially the little water glasses ;) ) and it is such a fun way to track my health. Keeps me goin man!

title: Update is great!
body: Simple to use and great features.  Definitely my favorite health app thus far.  HealthKit integration is awesome.

title: No!!
body: Let me start by saying this is a beautifully designed and user-friendly app. I used it primarily as a food journal, but I can't get behind the injustice it's doing to people accepting and acknowledging these food ratings as accurate. Frankly, it's unethical to (mis)lead users to believe that a Diet Coke is an 'A' and regular Coke is an 'E'. Tisk, tisk... Hoping for a moral update 'cause the app is otherwise a great tool for tracking intake + outtake!

title: Great!
body: It's a great app, but I have one problem. When you choose the weight loss plan, it asks you for your weight, and what your "goal weight" is. So I entered both it said "try a different number" for my goal weight. But that is my goal weight.......

title: Easy and simple
body: I am surprised that the free version offers as much as it does. The food tracker has a wide range of options making it much more accurate.

title: Great if you pay for it
body: I caved and bought the premium account for 3 months to see if it's worth it and u suppose it is. My main gripe is that all the recipes are in metric measurements and I'm a xenophobic American and I need my dumb imperial measurements that I'm used to! Idk what the heck 200g looks like! An option to convert inside the app would be awesome.

title: it keeps shutting down!!
body: I have been using the app for 3 days and I was loving it, but now I can't get it to stay open!! it opens for a few seconds, then just shuts down. I was going to upgrade but I will probably delete it by Monday if the problem isn't fixed

title: Normally enjoy
body: As of lately this app has really helped me track my macros which has been a little difficult in the past.

title: What can I say!
body: I have had this app for about 6 months now and I have lost 25 lbs.! The food database is huge! The only thing that I would like to see different would be it's ability to calculate body fat %. You have to rely on an outside source.

title: Love it!
body: I can really say I love this app! I have been using it for three weeks and I have lost 9 lbs in this short amount of time! It has changed my life on how I eat and I am very happy with my weight loss!

title: Love this app!
body: I wish there was more food choices but other than that this app is amazing! Really helps me keep track of my daily intake and focus on how to eat better!

title: Great app!
body: Tracks what you eat, and it has a lot of options. I work at the Cheesecake Factory and I wanted them to track one of my dinners. They had the salad I ordered and the calorie count. Impressed with this app thus far :)

title: Needs improvement
body: Wish I could add my own type of exercise and meals and for the premium to actually have guidance I thought that was the whole point of paying the extra bucks... I will def give five stars if some of these get fixed thanks id love it more!!!

title: Keeps Crashing
body: I just downloaded the app last night and really liked it - it worked great.  Today I tried to open it and it keeps crashing - every time I try to open it.  I'd love to continue using the app, but when it won't stay open for more than 10 seconds, it isn't usable. :(

title: Bugs!
body: New to Lifesum first week went smoothly. Now I'm having issues with the weight tracker. I update my weight every morning but the app has gone nuts and changes what I entered to 30 pounds less!!! I keep switching it back to what's it should be but every time I open the app to log meals and water intake it has dropped it again to 30lbs less that what it should be. This is becoming very unreliable

title: Great app
body: I really like using this for my Keto lifestyle. Keeps me posted on where I am throughout the day and easy to use. I haven't had any bug issues yet, so everything is great so far!

title: Love this app!
body: I love that this app keeps me accountable for what I eat. I have a goal in mind of how much weight I want to lose and this app really helps me stay focused. I love that it talks to my Apple Watch and tracks my workouts!

title: I love
body: I've use this app for two weeks to track my caloric consumption and I have lost 10 lbs. it's amazing how much of a difference one can make tracking what they eat

title: Best app I've used
body: I've used several apps before but this is 100 times in front.

title: Just awesome
body: Best way to keep track of all the calories you eat a day.

title: Great app!
body: For some reason the syncing with the Health app is a little off...it gave me 3 repeats of the same exercise. It should be possible to delete them like on the website. Other than that, it does all that I wanted and more! Very sleek and very useful.

title: Easy to use
body: I have been using different apps, but Lifesum was the easiest! It takes me less then a minute to put in all food for the day. Really nice advises and reminders. Simple, easy!

title: Love this App
body: Easy to use. Accurate calorie calculations. Love that it keeps track of your water consumption and the water notifications keep me hydrated all day. It's very convenient and easy to use.

title: Love it losing weight
body: I'm losing weight and because of it I have told two of my other friends and now they are doing it and losing weight also

title: Better than expected
body: I have been using my fitness pal for a while. I wanted to see what the difference was and have been pleasantly surprised. The app tells me where I'm being deficient in my nutrients and gives good recipe suggestions.

title: Wish it was more user friendly
body: I really wish this app was easier to add recipes. If it was, it would be perfect. I cook a lot and having to add each item is too time consuming. My Fitness Pal has an option to import recipes from online. If this was the case, I would keep my subscription and continue to use it.

title: Very accurate
body: It's amazing how detailed this app is I've downloaded some other apps before which had a bad quality but this one hasn't failed Me it is amazing

title: Love the app but.....
body: I love this app and how it rates your meals. It would be extremely helpful if it gave suggestions to go with the meals to make it a better choice. I have yet to get a complete healthy rating and I don't know what I'm missing or should omit from my meal.

title: I like it a lot!
body: I think this application is the one I use the most. The interface is very simple to use and I like that you can find all the foods you need by searching. Thanks!

title: Love so far
body: So far I really love this app it has helped me lose weight just by adding food and for me I have to write things down anyway cause of my memory but I can't do complicated with my head injury and it's very easy to me so far

title: Macro counting made easy
body: While I don't use all of its features, lifesum has been the perfect companion to an important body composition change.  I will probably keep using it indefinitely.

title: GREAT APP! However,
body: If they were able to make monthly payments an option for premium that would make it more attractive to buy.

title: Having the same problem!
body: Love this app usually but the new update messed up Health app import of activity. Now it looks like I exercised for 15 hours in a day. Please fix. Thank you!

title: Lifesum is right on the button!!
body: I love this app. It keeps me on track, tells me when I need to do more, do less, informs me by rating my meals and helps increase my chances of staying healthy. I love it!

title: Best diet app
body: I didn't realize i was living in a very unhealthy way until I am start using lifesum. And it so specific about every detail of eating also lifestyle.

title: Amazing, but crashes like no other!
body: It's amazing if it's not crashing. All it needs to do is to not crash. That's my only complaint. I love how accurate it is! And it tells you everything! Please just fix the cashing!

title: Amazing App! :)
body: Many things to upload and update about your health. If you are looking to log your exercise and keep up with your eating foods and habits, this app is perfect! Very good app, well done. :)

title: Needs improvements
body: Does not sync automatically to Fitbit, makes u click like three screens and then requires You to press sync. Doesn't refresh/update weight even if entered. Would be nice to have option to check food nutrition without going into a meal - if I'm grocery shopping shouldn't have to pretend I'm entering food for breakfast.

title: New Upgrade is a Disaster
body: I've been using this app for a while and always liked it until this last upgrade. The new graphics are pretty but it freezes and crashes constantly. It can take five or six attempts to sign on and them freeze in the middle of an entry. Very unhappy with this as it's so hard to use.

title: Good but inaccurate
body: I like the app. I like that it reminds me to track and drink water. I love the motivation it provides. However, the amounts and calories in many of the foods are inaccurate and the exercise isn't able to be customized with time and calories burned. Needs a few updates

title: Meh
body: I'm an avid health app user,here were the problems:

title: Excellent!
body: I must say I've only used the free version, but even that helps manage your basic health and fitness goals! I look forward to upgrading so I can sync with my Fitbit!

title: Really good but...
body: This app actually helped me lose some weight and become mindful of what I'm eating, which is great... except most of the features can only be accessed my buying a membership, which I hate. I don't have the money to do that, and I'm sure others don't either.

title: Love it
body: Used this to help me be more conscious of what I ate when I tried a gluten-free diet during lent. It helped me also to understand how many calories I was consuming per day and when I ate unhealthy the fat was high.

title: Amazing
body: No complaints gonna try it out today and see how much better premium is. If it's this good free it'll be even better paid for!!! Can't wait üòä

title: It freezes too much
body: Very great app !! Helped me to stay consistent in my meal plan start seeing results instantly . Was skeptical about how much carbs I had to eat daily to lose weight like 50% however , the results are astonishing . The only downfall is that it freezes

title: Nice!
body: The app has an organic feel to it, so it is not really a burden to document food. Also, the meal ratings are helpful too. However, a few features are closed to people who don't have premium membership. Nonetheless, it's really nice.

title: Awesome app that easily tailors to your needs
body: This app has helped me gain muscle and lose fat. It can be a little tricky to navigate at first, but once you get the hang of it, you will find yourself reaching your goals faster and with more ease.  Things I like:

title: Horrible. Had High Hopes.
body: I don't normally write Reviews but I had to in order to warn others before getting this app. This app had huge issues with syncing, water log not working with Apple Watch, very buggy and crashed a lot! Until problems get solved, stay away from this app. It's a waste of time downloading and trying to work around the bugs and constant crashing.

title: Good potential but....
body: This app is clean, cool and informative. The free version is great and I was looking at upgrading until I saw they had monthly payments. I feel you would have more upgrades if you offered a one time fee rather than monthly payments. Seems to turn people off.

title: Update?
body: I loved this app until the new update, it will not even update all the way, the logo is gone, it will not let me delete it and reinstall. But when I go into the AppStore it gives me the choice to download again, then never finishes. I am very upset because I paid over $35 for this app, now I can't use it. If this changes, I will be happy again, but as of right now, I can't even use it.

title: Gorgeous App
body: So far so good! It's very well designed and easy to use. I highly recommend getting this app, even the free features are super useful. Definitely the best tracker app I've used so far!

title: Great Way to Get Healthy
body: Rates meals and days so you can make better decisions in the future, tracks progress, great format that's easy to use and see. Would highly recommend!

title: Multiple Updates since bug reported and still there
body: I reported a bug about 2 months ago with 3D Touch the home icon and was told it was being worked on at least 2 updates have come out since then and when I still 3D Touch on the icon it defaults to lunch even at 7AM. I'm switching to Lose It!

title: Better Than Any Other Fitness App!
body: Love it! So much easier to follow and much quicker. More exercise options to add your calories burned! Very pleased and will continue to use it daily!!

title: Suggested improvement
body: I find this app very helpful but I wish when adding a new food you could add more than just calories. I would love to be able to add other nutritional facts (protein, fiber, etc.) and save the food.

title: Makes a tedious joyless task fun!
body: Lifesum makes the tedious & joyless task of meal tracking delightful. There's a perfect combination of playfulness & design that makes tracking meals fun. I also love their taste in recipes. The animations & design are the best I've seen & remind me why good ui matters!!!

title: Great App
body: Married with a breastfed 6 month old so the app really helps me hold myself accountable for getting enough water & eating properly even when my spouse doesn't.

title: Amazing app for anyone serious about nutrition.
body: Allows you to scan barcodes and enter 1/2 servings and search specific products. Recommends the proper amount of calories and macros for each meal.

title: Please fix new version bugs!!
body: It updated and. Hanged color yesterday and now nothing works right. All of my own recipes and meals are missing ingredients when I try to edit them it creates a whole new recipe in the list and then when I add it to my day, it never shows up. This is very frustrating!! I just went Gold a week ago because this app is perfect for me. Please fix it soon!!!

title: First time user
body: I've just heard of Lifesum, the little I've been seen I liked it. I have high blood pressure and high glucose. The doctor send me to eat healthy and walk 45minutes 3 days a week. I hope with the help of this app I'll get in track. Thank you Lifesum!!üëçüèª

title: One of the best health apps
body: I have used lose it! Before and this is a totally better app...there is a feature to remind you how much water you should have which I love! The downside is it's hard to input your own food :/

title: Used to love it...
body: Now I'll be removing it from my phone. Originally you could add water, meals, and exercises at any time in any order. Now it does it by steps. So for example, if you exercise first thing in the morning, you can't enter it before breakfast. Not everyone is on the same schedule. Take off the steps and it's perfect again!

title: Awesome, but you can improve something
body: Developers keep on improving this great app, the most important is to add more exercises for gym (such as lifting weights, including different types of them (free and fixed)

title: Messy Search
body: When searching for meals, the results are all messed up and confusing. Pictures would also help A LOT on these searches.

title: Decent app. Overpriced.
body: It's a nice app it gives you a few more features, like recipes and more detailed info (if available) for foods. However, it is way over priced, considering myfitnesspal is free. The app does not feature a widget which is super annoying (myfitnesspal has this feature). Also, I've found that the "add water" function on the Apple Watch does not work! Very frustrating!

title: Great App!
body: I absolutely love this app. Besides being able to track by food, I like how it syncs with my FitBit. I also love the design of the app. It's very colorful and appealing. I would highly recommend this app.

title: So crashy, edit: and buggy!
body: Basically crashes once for each time I want to use it. Sometimes through long hangs followed by the system killing it. Quite frustrating, certainly wouldn't pay for this level of quality.

title: The best! Well worth the price.
body: Not sure how they can improve on this app. Although some way to track weightlifting and running progress would be nice.

title: Good idea but failed miserably
body: Pros: looks nice, circle fills up based on how much you've eaten

title: Great
body: I wanted to lose a few pounds and this is the perfect helper tool. I can keep track of exercise and diet, and even water intake. I used to have 3 separate apps for that and then I found this one. Love it.

title: I wanted to like it
body: Intuitive user interface, software worked fine on my iPhone 6. However, food database was extremely sparse compared to other products that are available. I found myself regularly having to manually input food values from very popular stores, for instance Starbucks.

title: Poor design and functionality
body: When I initially downloaded this appointment really liked it. But after paying for premium I realize now all the problems with it. Some of the nutrition information is wrong and it seems to not even know how many ounces there are in a cup. In addition the search function in the diary is very poor. Save your money on this one.

title: User friendly
body: It's easy to use. The lookup list is what keeps me using it. I'm not a serious calorie counter but this keeps me aware. It has helped me to make more conscious choices. There's a lot of useful things in the free version.

title: Exercise increases really screw up the data
body: Just to echo the other people who have commented on the crazy increases in exercise. I feel like it happens when you go back and fort between days to compare your progress. I just want to highlight that this should be fixed and if it is, this would be my go to health app

title: Food Tracker
body: This is a great way to jump start your weight loss.  Tracking your food is the number one way to lose weight.  I'm a fan!

title: Good!
body: Great app! The only thing is I wish it would suggest meals/foods based on the carbs/fats/protein intake.

title: Used to love it, now it's kinda glitchy
body: I started using this about 2 weeks ago and it was AMAZING! But over the last few days, it's started to become glitchy. The app freezes, the walking count is always off and keeps resetting. It's too bad, LifeSum was so good!

title: Loves it!
body: I love this app! I use it everyday! I've lost 4.5lbs and I've only been using it 2 weeks!! I only wish they had more food options and more workout options..

title: Could be better
body: It's very easy to use but it is a little hard to find some foods on the app and especially hard to find the correct workouts

title: Love!
body: I loved Lifesum and it's interface so much that I upgraded to the gold membership within the first day that I got it! It holds me accountable and lays out everything in front of me to clearly see. üòä

title: Good, but currently buggy
body: Though the gold-level prices are a little steep, it's a good app marred by bugginess. The worst is a newer issue wherein adding saved meals to the daily diary adds them to the following day instead. Not great when 50% of the time the app fails its most basic and critical function.

title: Solid, extendable calorie tracker
body: Easy UI, extensive food database which is simple to add to. Wish units of measure were more consistent. Good goal-setting options. Have been using it daily.

title: Completely satisfied--highly recommended
body: It absolutely worth the price...you can gain or loose weight or be more healthy...it organizes your life in order to having a great shape...enjoy

title: Great
body: Great app to meet goals for strength training. Most apps just try and get you to lose weight. Not here, you can program meal plans to put on size and strength and not just cut down. Great stuff.

title: Love the reminders
body: To track meals & drink water etc. will not upgrade as i've been on this app for 1 week and i usually have trouble staying connected or motivated soon.  Maybe with the reminders it will help.

title: Such a great app!
body: I like this app better than any of the other apps that track calories. I hope they also input the Paleo/Whole 30 in the diet book for the CrossFit freaks!

title: So far so good
body: I'm in love with this app! The key to it is to stay proactive and motivated or else it won't work for you. This is the first app I saw that catered to weight gain which made me hype! And so far it helps to keep me on task.

title: Losing weight!
body: Great app. Helped me to stay motivated in order to lose 17 pounds in 7 weeks. I am from another country and many of the dishes we eat are on this app.

title: Lame
body: This app needs work I would like to be able to delete items I accidentally added. For the example I entered a generic item but actually found out listed the real item. If this could improve and also not be so expensive for something that's easily done in another app.

title: Good app but upgrading is pushed too hard
body: Like the app, like the motivation. However, upgrading to a $10 per month plan is not worth it and pushing it on the user so aggressively is annoying and distracting. Myfitnesspal is a better choice for a completely free and fully usable app.

title: Don't purchase - they change what you purchase and no refunds!
body: I purchased this app (full year membership) specifically for the keto feature and one day I open the app and they no longer offer the options for that diet! When contacting them they would not refund or help out in any way! Don't purchase theirs tons of free apps that are much better out there like myfitnesspal!

title: Finally a useful combo
body: I love the diets and suggestions, but the recipes really make this more than just calorie counting which many others don't go beyond.

title: Fit is sweeet
body: Very good app but the only thing is not to many exercise options like when you go to the exercise option but  "excellent"

title: So far so good
body: Learning so much about food and how to have a more balanced diet. Already losing a little weight- excited to see where it takes me

title: So far so great!!?
body: Hello first of all amazing app, great layout and good features. I've just started and I really want to lose weight do you guys promise this will actually help me? And does this app notify me when I lose a pound? Good tracking system üëçüèº

title: App crashing
body: Hello not able to contact you thru the app because it shuts down after opening and you do not have an email on your website for assistance. Upgraded to premium and now app closes after opening. Please advise. Thanks.

title: Bugs
body: All this app does is crash my phone and watch.  Please fix, I just upgraded to a paid membership and now I can't use the app.

title: Great!!!!!!!!
body: I like this program alot, but i would like another update that could include what time the food was input. This would help ppl space out their meals during the day...

title: Good App
body: I like this app. It's easy to use and keeps you on track. However, I wish you could use other features without having to upgrade. There should also be more diverse exercises in the database as well as food options. Overall, I love it!!

title: In app purchases are broken
body: In app purchased is completely broken. I have bought year membership almost a week ago, and still do not have it. Tech support claims I was logged into different account while purchasing. This is ridiculous. Taking into account that they answer once a day this is getting really annoying.

title: Love
body: I love this app very much. It is simple to use and very efficient. I don't get bored with logging foods, and I have definitely lost weight from using it. 10/10 recommend üíò

title: ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è
body: I love this app! It is perfect for tracking foods because they have every brand in their system so you can record exactly what u ate and it's calories! The only thing I would change is to have the app GIVE A ONE-TIME PAYMENT OPTION INSTEAD OF MONTHLY!

title: Very Handy App
body: I'll probably purchase the premier but I'm still just getting started. The app really gives me the ability to track everything I want. I can also link it to the iPhone health app.

title: Great app
body: This app is great for understanding food! One small thing is it's hard to pick the exact right brand of things sometimes. But other than that great!

title: Confused a little
body: So far it's an amazing app and I love using it. BUT the subscription says $3.75 a month or $40+ a year. Do you only have to pay by month or the whole lump sum at once? Just a little confused on that.

title: Great Graphics but...
body: The sleek design is refreshing, but everything useful costs extra. The silly thing is- these extras are free in other apps. I'm not going to pay $30 upfront for a 6 month commitment to an app "extra." I can get the same info for free pretty much anywhere else.

title: Trial
body: It was great at figuring things while still researching macronutrients and how it all works. So much more efficient than counting calories. Will definitely upgrade soon.

title: Love the shape up
body: It is a great tool to use to know how much calories that you are taking. This helps to see what kind of food selections I need to do to loose wait. Helps me big time.

title: Very easy and simple
body: A huge database of foods it what i appreciate the most. You can take advantage of using  foods that other members created and also add /create your own

title: Don't buy it!!
body: I was ver happy with shape up. I had almost one year with the golden subscription but they recently change to this and change everything. Nothing works now!

title: Helpful and easy
body: I just started today, but this is so simple to use and I think it will help me on my journey to lose weight and improve my health.

title: Review
body: This app works very well. Though I have just downloaded it, I can not wait to see my weight loss process with the help and guidance from this app.

title: Works, but not very user friendly.
body: Downloaded for the iWatch compatibility. Missing a few features, and user interface is a bit difficult to use, but overall, performs the desired function.

title: Amazing
body: Best health app out there period! The choices in diet are perfect and so essential because not everyone can follow the same diet plan. I have gluten allergies and I tend to eat more fat than carbs . This app rocks my life

title: Exactly what I was looking for
body: App has it all you really can't go wrong with all the features it has for free. The premium seems like it's something I would purchase in the future.

title: Love it
body: The experience is great, intuitive.  The look and feel is modern and easy.  Love the idea of the different plans and feedback on food logged.  Please add more food plans and recipes.  Also an integration with Hidrate water bottle would be great.

title: Handy and Easy to Use
body: The app is very easy to use and is super insightful. I would like to see "vegetarian", "vegan", or "whole food plant based" as diet options. Mine is currently set to standard although I eat a whole food, plant based diet.

title: Very useful and straightforward
body: This app is great for not only helping me to see what I'm actually taking in but also to keep my on track with a healthier lifestyle. Keeps me motivated.

title: Great app
body: I'm really enjoying the app. I just downloaded it yesterday and I'm loving it. It has almost everything I would like to see a place for vitamins and supplements on the tracker though. That would make it the best!

title: Amazing
body: This app is great! You can insert almost any food or exercise. The calculations and response time is immediate. The only suggestion I have is to add more types of exercise (i.e. playing with kids, washing dishes).

title: Great!!
body: The ability to scan barcodes makes tracking calories so much more convenient.

title: Awesome support for ketogenic diet
body: I wanted to try a ketogenic diet and this app has been a fantastic support. Honestly, after 6 weeks using the tool, and eating keto, I can say I've never felt better!

title: Great so far!
body: I've only been using this for a few days but I'm really liking all the features and food choices so far!

title: Love it
body: This app is amazing, it makes me feel better about how I eat and that I'm makeing the right health choices. Can't wait to upgrade it to the full version. üòç

title: Crashing Every Few Seconds
body: I really really wanted to love this app but I haven't been able too because it keeps crashing before I can get anything done!! I like that you can see your calories and macros at once and it's beautifully made but I haven't been able to log much because it keeps crashing. It's ridiculously frustrating!!!

title: Feeling healthier than ever
body: Helps me keep track of my daily activity and how much food I should be eating to keep up with my workouts

title: Stick with it!
body: Great app that helps you stay focused on you. Dieticians all say to notate your caloric intake and monitor your exercise routine, this so does it all. Stick with it, and be honest with yourself and YOU WILL see results.

title: Solid App!
body: I like this app better than some of the other calorie-tracking apps I have used. The list of foods in the database is extensive and pretty accurate. I have recommended this app to several friends.

title: Easy to use
body: Easy to keep track of daily protein requirements, which is a challenge since I love carbs and am vegetarian. I like that I can create favorites, meals, and look up foods online. Great app.

title: Logging food easier
body: Makes logging meals so much easier and let's you know if you need to eat more to keep you on track. Awesome!

title: Track your day in food & exercise
body: Makes it easy to track food, calories & water each day!

title: Improve
body: Love this app!! Would like to see more connections with restaurants though so I can log my food better and see which options on the menu are the best for my meal plan!

title: Me gusta
body: Very helpful just two inconveniences. 1) sometimes it doesn't have the food you ate and you can't add it and 2) I'm not going to pay to see meal plans and stuff but I wanna see them! No big deal though lol

title: The New Look is Horrible
body: I've been using Lifesum religiously to track my food, water, and exercise this year, and have been loving it. However, I HATE the new look. Smiley faces instead of grades? Not only is it not as accurate, it's also really childish, and not as motivating. I don't like the new color changed from the original green either.

title: Get this and reach your goals!
body: So easy to use and fun! Offers a lot of different options to help you stay on track. Get it.

title: Great for Change
body: This is a great app with a bunch of eating programs that you can change to keep things fun and interesting and it syncs with everything!

title: You have to pay for everything now
body: The app used to be pretty good for everyone, but now you have to pay for premium to do basically everything and I feel like I'm not getting much out of it anymore.

title: Can I get a refund?
body: This app most definitely has potential..  but right now it's a total waste. I spent $10 expecting a wide array of foods to choose from.. and it figures that nothing I eat is in here! Update the foods! People eat out, people eat and drink name brand foods! I uninstalled it until there's an update. It's gotta get better than this!

title: Super helpful for diet and exercise counting
body: I really love this program I think it's my dream to keep all what I put in my mouth writen down now it the chance to do it and free thanks for this app makers I love u diserve 5 stars.

title: Great weight loss tool
body: I love this app! I have been using it for at least 2 years and it has helped me hold myself accountable to lose 25lbs and keep it off.

title: Live This App
body: It is super easy to keep track of everything I eat and see how many carbs, fat, and protein I eat in a day. Easy to search the online database and find foods to add.

title: Many Inaccurate calorie counts
body: This is basically a calorie counting app. Since its subscription based, I expected it to be extremely well designed AND with an excellent food database.

title: Slim variety of food to choose from
body: I love the look of this app. However, the lack of food and exercise listed in the data base makes it difficult and time consuming to use. I have to look up and manually enter most foods that I eat.

title: Love this app
body: Fantastic app. Easy to use and so many different ways to count food. Love that I can check out other ways to diet and or eat healthy.

title: Favorite health tracking app
body: I love this app.  It is clean and easy to use.  This is the first app to really encourage me to drink more water.  I like the different diet options and recipes and the scoring of my meals.

title: Looks and works great
body: I care about how apps look and this one nailed it. Not only is it easy to use but it's everything I want in a fitness tracker.

title: I am loving the app
body: I am loving the app but it seems to start glitching and shutting itself down every once and a while along with twice today before I could add any data.

title: Lifesum
body: This app is great because it does the basics of tracking calories and exercise but a lot of the features aren't available unless your a gold member or something. Overall this app is great

title: Very satisfied so far
body: Of all the food log/diet apps I've tried I find this one to be the easiest to work with in terms of both user friendliness and utility.

title: Lost 50 pounds using Lifesum
body: What more can I say? So easy to use, let's you focus on your day-to-day health efforts without spending much time recording information.

title: New version is confusing.
body: The new version has smiley and frowning faces instead of letters to rate the foods and meals. I like the letters from early versions 100 times more because it's so much more professional and less confusing. Otherwise the app is pretty fantastic.

title: Easy to Use
body: I always come back to Lifesum when I start tracking calories again.

title: Love love love
body: I love this app bc of the barcode scanner, ease and accuracy! So helpful. One star off because I wish you didn't have to pay for premium features. Other than that, best fitness tracker app I've tried

title: Love
body: So far I'm loving that this app focuses on nutritional value and not just calories also love the happy and sad faces for some reason makes me want to get all smileys and the water consumption

title: Great
body: An easy convenient way to keep track of what and how I eat.  I feel more confident with my body and the calories I consume on a daily basis to maintain a healthy lifestyle!!!

title: It makes me feel a little healthier.
body: I'm tracking my exercise and calorie intake for my wedding. I was recommended by a friend to use this app. It does a pretty good job with tracking the food. The exercise is another story...

title: Just downloaded, app keeps crashing
body: I don't normally write reviews but I was really excited about this app. I've had it for all of 10 minutes. Any time I attempt to explore the app, it crashes. üò° I plan on keeping the app for a little while and hopefully the issue is fixed soon.

title: This app is amazing!
body: For those of you peeps still on the weight watchers scam, 1 ww point = 50 calories. This app is very flexible a adding an searching for food, and the chart features are so useful!

title: Love it
body: Simple and easy to use! Looks good too. Only reason I gave it 4 instead of 5 stars is that I think the water counter should be available without subscription, kinda basic.

title: TruStar
body: I've  had other apps that let me track my meals, but this one does much more. I can keep track of my protein intake, look up foods online, it tracks my weight, and it's FREE!!!

title: Great App
body: I love how everything you need to help you lose weight is all in one app. I even can keep track of inches. I recommend this one for everyone.

title: üëç
body: Love it!  iPhone app much better than on computer because water tracking is really helping my compliance and success.

title: In love with this app!!!
body: Easy to use and understand. Love tracking my calories and seeing how many calories I've earned with my exercises. My new favorite app!

title: So close
body: There is not one good tracking app that has it all. I've tried loseit and myfitnesspal and I don't have the confidence they know what direction to go in. Lifesum is getting close and I feel they are focused enough.

title: Syncing
body: I got this app because it's compatible with Apple watch. Unfortunately it doesn't always work. You get some of the info but not all. I paid for an upgraded version and that doesn't seem to help either.

title: Functionality
body: Needs to have a diary portion so you can track how you feel while experiencing the new diet.  Also agree that it should sync with the Bodyspace app to include all the lifting routines I have built for caloric burn.

title: Needs option to make your own recipes
body: I really love this app so far, and I would be willing to switch from myfitnesspal to this app IF they let me build my own recipes and track how many calories are in the things I cook!

title: They just want Money
body: They keep slowly taking features away unless you pay for the monthly subscription (which is super expensive, for a few mediocre features).

title: Great functionality, fun to use
body: Easy to get started and use.  Would be nice to see more options for variation in the water intake screen.

title: Recent updates = duplicated activity
body: In the past two days, something has happened (10.1.1? 10/31 update?), and Lifesum is now recording multiples of iOS activity -- both iPhone and Apple Watch -- rendering activity tracking (and, thus, calorie counting) useless. I would love to have walked 38 miles yesterday, as the app said I did, but those were calories I'm afraid I didn't earn.

title: Easy to use
body: I like be the barcode scanner and all the extras like recipes and things that come with this app. Even just the free version is amazing!

title: Closes after only being open 30sec
body: With the new update, app crashes after only being open for 30 seconds (even when I don't tap or touch the screen). Other than that, I really like the app!

title: Works very good for being FREE
body: This app helps watch what and how you eat.  If you really want it to work for you, you have to put some effort and research into it.  Good luck!

title: This app is awesome!
body: Love this app! The only is I wish the premium option was a little cheaper, would definitely upgrade if so!

title: Really enjoying
body: I haven't used it long, but I really like the layout, easy to use. I wish I could in recipes though.

title: My favorite app
body: Love Lifesum much more easier and better than all the other fitness/tracking apps I've tried

title: Whhhyyy
body: I really like this app but I have a Fitbit and it won't let me sync my steps or workouts without having preminum. So because of that I'm gonna give it 3 stars and I'm gonna delete itüòû without my exercise syncing it's pointless. My fitness pal I can do it on the free version üôÅ

title: Great app for great health
body: I have used the ShapeUp app for about 14 months and recommend it enthusiastically and without reservation. I have lost and kept off 20 pounds. It's still up to you, but this is an excellent tool to achieve and maintain a healthy lifestyle.

title: Great App
body: Helps keep track of my weight loss and my eating habits .....not sure if it is accurate with calorie loss for exercise I think it over estimates some exercises so I decrease my time input for a more realistic diary.  For a free app best one I have used!!

title: wow.
body: I can't believe I paid for a subscription for this. The design of the app is nice but the fact that the barcode scanner still forced me to manually input the info of a Sierra Mist bottle just proves how much work the food database needs. It's useless to me otherwise. Everything else was solid, but this is crucial. I wish I could get my money back, to be honest. Most terrible investment yet...

title: Looks slicker than ever!
body: This app has really helped me to take actionable insights towards my health goals. iOS HealthKit integrations is great as well as data import from Withings and Runkeeper. Big fan!

title: Strong app, could improve further
body: Good dietary tracker and I like the integration with Fitbit, Withings, etc.  I agree with others that the library of scannable UPCs needs to be broadened and should be easier to set up custom meals for repeat use

title: Great app
body: I love this app it really helps me keep track of everything I do during the day. It's super easy to navigate so if you're looking to get in shape this is a great app

title: You can't cancel
body: It's not a bad app, too much work for me, but when I tried to cancel, it told me I have to stop payments via the source of funds - so I have to contact my bank or whatever. I can't even figure out how to change payment methods. This is completely scammy. I would never recommend something that clearly does not care about the consumer.

title: Great little helper
body: Due to a recent health condition after having some supplements that really messed up my hormones, this little app has been a great help. To monitor nutrition, water and exercise. üòäüòä‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è

title: Super useful!!
body: I love this app! Great for everyone because of its diverse goals. It does a great job at keeping me on track, and I see the progress both on screen and in real life!

title: Great but can't use
body: I love all the features but I can't do anything because the app keeps crashing about 5 seconds into being opened. I'm going to delete off my phone and try to re download when I get home.

title: Love this app!!!!
body: Perfect app to keep myself in check and it's really nice that it shows an estimated time in which to reach your goal...keeps the motivation level high:)

title: Worked well, until...
body: After the update, this app started to delete some of the foods I entered. It's annoying having to enter your food twice. Please fix this glitch, because I am very tempted to switch to another app now

title: Recommended
body: I have lost some weight since I started using this app. The app overall is great, provides great nutritional information!

title: Easy to use
body: It's easy to use and doesn't make you feel super guilty. Great new features in the most recent update with bar scanners

title: Could be a great app but disappoints
body: I was excited about upgrading this app but after a few days I thought maybe it was a waste of money. The grading on meals is very inaccurate. For example, I don't understand how a meal of Greek yogurt (A), blueberries (A), and raspberries (A) averages out to a D grade. This doesn't make sense. Please fix soon or I will be asking for a refund!!!

title: Much better than Fitbit
body: I love this for tracking my macros. I'm an avid home cook so I use the recipe feature CONSTANTLY! Worth the premium membership and love the recipes in the community.

title: Awesome little app!
body: Finally, a fitness tracker that doesn't have ads! It also delivers what it says it will! Apple watch app is pretty bad though.

title: Needs fixes
body: I love this app and use it every day for tracking my eating, drinking, and exercise. The connection with the Apple Watch/Health app always goes off and on. It's so annoying. Please fix!

title: Good idea but not for everyone
body: This is a genius app but it won't let me input the weight I want to be. I'm 70 now and I would like to gain 10 lbs. It won't let me use 80 lbs as my goal. I don't want to gain 30 lbs soon as I am still growing and that's pretty unhealthy for me. Please fix soon!

title: As usual, everything's about weight
body: Despite the fact that this app claims to let you choose other goals besides weight loss, it won't let you use it without inputting your weight. I'm healthier when I don't track my weight or focus on it, so that makes this app useless for me.

title: Amazingly perfect
body: Had everything you would ever need to lose weight!!!

title: Good parts and annoying parts
body: Overall great app and idea. It is nearly impossible to log food. I cook and do my weekly meals. It's very hard to log all the different ingredients. Logging food is hard and if simplified I would change to 5/5.

title: Frequently crashes
body: Love the app but the new version crashes so much that it does not allow me to do anything!!! üò≠ Once that issue is resolve I'll be able to rate it five stars!

title: Aesthetic
body: With the newest update it looks really nice and it's easy to use. I like the sound it makes when you fill in a water glass.

title: This will help me lose weight
body: I just started using it and it is very informing and does the best with telling me what I should eat and what exercise I should do

title: Great, but...
body: Beautiful design and you can see your macros easier than other apps. Simply wished I could synchronize with my FitBit without upgrading to premium which is the biggest downside for me.

title: Well designed, helpful and goal driven.
body: This app is very helpful. It congratulates you on achievements, shares great recipes and has shown me results. Try the free version, chances are you will love it!

title: Love this!
body: I really love the smiley face with good choices. I guess that means I need strangers approval/judgement to keep me in line. Whatever works, I suppose! This app is really well designed- way to go guys!

title: Expensive
body: I love the basic but love seeing what is good and not so good for you. I wish they would give you a free trial of the premium like the MyFitnessPal just to see if it is something I think is worth it.

title: Crashing!!
body: The app keeps crashing after the last update!! Please fix!! Otherwise love the app!

title: Great app!
body: I really enjoy using this app. I use the free version and it suits me perfectly! I'd love to have the additional features, but I don't want to pay for them :) overall I am starting to shape-up with the help of this app!

title: Barcode
body: I like this app. but you need to fix the barcode thing, it will not read ANY and it is a hassle to try to look up foods when I can just show it the barcode....

title: Update is messed up!
body: It will not let me add food from meals I've created. It says tracked calories but then when I go to the wheel window it says I've eaten 0 calories. It will only track stuff that's built in to the app, not the created meals. Please fix this! I've been a loyal gold club member for 6 months. I use this app every day and this is extremely frustrating.

title: Works like magic
body: There are lots of functions to pay for, but the free version is really good if you only need to track yor diet and/exercise

title: Great!
body: This app is great for tracking food and motivation. It gives you reminders to drink water and foods to eat. It would be nice if you didn't have to upgrade to get the other recipes!

title: What a joke.
body: Absolutely hate this app. The calorie counts on everything I have found is inaccurate. Apparently to them, a cup is just one ounce. It would be very easy to use this as a guide and accidentally over eat because their portion size to calorie count is so off. I will do everything in my power to get my money back from the subscription of this.

title: Don't like the update
body: At first, the health rating for meals and your day seemed helpful, but after using it I realized it is actually not helpful at all. The ratings don't make any sense. I had baked chicken breast and asparagus for lunch and got a D rating. The app was much better before this update.

title: Best results!
body: Love the changes I'm already seeing after a week! Easy to use and keeps me motivated! The only thing to make it better is if it would link with my Fitbit.

title: The best so far
body: I've tried many and this one is the most accurate and rewarding and eassyyyy to keep track !

title: Great app
body: I have only used this app for 2 days. I already love it. Hopefully  it will help me see where I need to make changes. UPDATE: Still loving it and reached some good mile stones.

title: Lifesum doesn't capture my calories burn accurately.
body: I find myself going to the apple health app or myfitnespal to view my calories burned for the day because Lifesum fails to update it accurately. I've had an experience where it didn't update at all for the entire day. Should I just switch back to myfitnespal?

title: Good app
body: App really helps you see what you're eating in a day. I wish it allowed you to modify the recipes it suggests to reflect what you may use so that calories and nutrients would be correct.

title: Has gotten worse, unusable.
body: This app had many flaws but was useful and helpful in losing weight and monitoring my calories. It's integration with Apple Watch has been shaky. It's impossible now. It rarely imports my activity from the watch. It's so manual intensive now I'm switching apps.  Also been charged twice for subscription. Was 3-4 stars at one point. Now worse.

title: Pretty great
body: Very functional and easy to use yet has plenty features. Easy to track and also to set goals. Very happy

title: Great app
body: This app is shows a preview of the paid app. This free app is very limited due to the trial version but it calculates calories and all. The downside to this app is having a lower diverse choice of food. This may not have your food if its not a top brand. This app is still very beneficial.

title: User Friendly!!
body: Easy to navigate which makes you want to use it!!

title: Great app
body: Helps me stay on top of the food I eat, drink enough water and exercise at least 30 minutes a day.

title: Sorry Lifesum, gotta go back to MFP
body: I love your design and interface but almost every food item is incorrect (calories, macro content, etc) I lived with it for a while updating them myself, but eventually had to give up. Back to MyFitnessPal it is... :(

title: Amazing
body: The app is very helpful and helps me lose the right amount of weight. Thank you for the bug fixes too!!!

title: Love it!!
body: I've wanted an app like this for years and finally found it! This app is super easy to use and gives immediate feedback!

title: Happy!!!
body: I am very happy with this app. It lets you keep track of food, exercise, weight  & measurements. After this trial I think I'm going to upgrade to gold!

title: I love it!
body: I've tried many apps for health maintenance and this one is by far my favorite. Easy to use. I love the reminders...cuz we all need a reminder now and then.

title: So helpful!
body: I'm really enjoying this app so far. I appreciate the ability to customize your goal macros (fat, carbs, protein) and all the helpful tips, reminders, and "gold stars."

title: On a quest
body: On a quest to change the perception of food, focusing on quality, not quantity and attempting to take ownership of my health/fitness. Lifesum has helped me track and learn but most importantly stay motivated.

title: A helpful tool
body: It's nice to wake up and be reminded to eat breakfast when all you can think about is how busy your day is going to be and you forget to take care of yourself.

title: not quite
body: I love the interface and how things are organized. The deal breaker for me is that important features like Fitbit synchronization are locked behind a subscription.

title: Excellent!
body: I have been using this app for a few months and it has completely changed the game. Love it!

title: honestly pretty good
body: the design is really pretty and i love the fact that you can track water, even though it's in glasses and not cups.

title: Watch update ruined it
body: I was loving this app - the interface was clean, and I could log common food & water on my app without needing to take out my phone. BUT this new update with its "tamagotchi" reminders is useless. I don't see how a cartoon reminding me to eat/drink/workout is more helpful than the ability to actually log eating/drinking/working out. Uninstalling.

title: Love It!
body: I love this app so much I quit using MyFitnessPal. While the catalog of foods/recipes isn't as extensive, I love how it rates your nutrition to help you stay on track and keep your meals balanced.

title: I like it but I don't
body: Ok to use as guide and tracker but not to follow strictly. The meal and day ratings are confusing. I don't get how everything in a meal can get an A but the meal itself gets an E?Then it tells me I'm off track when I'm not. Motivation to do better maybe.

title: Awesome!
body: Love this app!!! It's easy to use and helps me stay on track.  I wish I could get it to sync with my jawbone Up2 but otherwise no complaints...

title: Fun UX high hopes for future!
body: I love this app so far! I transferred from another tracker app and am super into the fun and friendly UX. Hoping more auto-populating food options and exercises like Vinyasa Yoga will be added with time. Off to a beautiful start!

title: Inaccurate
body: The app in concept is really nice. I love how user friendly it is, however several days it has told me that i have had 10,000 calories left in the day after a full day of eating. Which is obviously not correct being that I don't move at all in the day.

title: Exercise Tracking
body: Used to work perfectly fine, however this update seemed to glitch the automatic imports of my exercise as it gets imported multiple times. Love the app.. just need to fix the exercise tracking :(

title: Hate this app
body: I downloaded to jumpstart my weight loss but it was already Messing  up before I could create my account and then it kept randomly closing and had a serious bug issue and random shut downs you should fix it before you promote such a app but when it wasn't closing it look like it was very good I'm happy with that

title: Great application
body: Very useful for length your intakes of each vitamin protein and a lot of things more that you body needs in the day by day!

title: Bad calorie/exercise tracker
body: I enter my exercise into the app (which the calories burned for certain exercises are completely off) and it shows up on a different day. I burned 418 calories yesterday and entered the info into the the app. It showed up on today's calorie count. It's throwing off my data and percentages.

title: Wonderful!
body: I love this app, but I do wish that there were more options available without premium.

title: Love this app!
body: Lifesum makes it easy to track my calories and exercise. I love the suggestions and reactions from the app when you eat a healthy meal. :D

title: Helpful
body: I think it's a great app, it helps you recognize how are your alimentary habits going and give you tips to change them.

title: Pretty sweet - definitely helped me become healthier
body: The water feature is ESPECIALLY nice. I do wish the they subtracted calories when you input workout information, though.

title: Very convenient
body: Just starting and I'm looking foward to losing some weight over the next few weeks..!!

title: Great at guiding weight loss!
body: With an Apple watch, the Health App, and Lifesum's interface for tracking what goes in my mouth and how that relates to exercise and steps, it makes loosing weight predictable and sensible.

title: Had high hopes
body: I use this app for two days, and now I'm deleting it. I have the Apple Watch, and the data will not properly sync between the watch and my phone. Everything that I logged on the watch gets overwritten, as soon as I open the app on my phone. Sorry. I tried.

title: Don't Buy It
body: Don't get suckered into buying the Premium version. The free app was promising so I expected the paid version to be better. Wrong. I can't even tell what's different except they alter the macronutrients slightly. $50 to tell me a "high protein" diet has more protein than a balanced diet. Canceled my subscription and will never even use the free app again out of disappointment. Snake oil salesmen.

title: Great little app
body: I like the variety of diets, allowing me to track my plan based on my preferences. The regular reminders are really great, too!  Worth the upgrade!

title: Its aight
body: This app is average at best, there are other very similar apps that so more and work better. Im disappointed that there are very little exercises you can add in for example I simply tried to put "side crunch" as an exercise I did and it couldn't find a result!

title: Great app
body: I've been using this app for about a month now and it's really helping me stay accountable for eating healthier and to lose weight!

title: Useless
body: While this app is aesthetically pleasing, functionally it's a mess. When it works, it works fairly well and has the potential to be THE food/ activity tracking app. Unfortunately, it crashes, freezes my phone and is utterly useless more often than not.
